T02D1351:220b-1: pa ra m'artha sam gra ha n'a ma se kod de sh'a t'i ka / bod skad du /
T02D1351:220b-2: dbang mdor bstan pa'i 'grel bshad don dam pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1351:220b-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1351:220b-4: sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi dri med sangs rgyas chos //
T02D1351:220b-5: nges par 'byed pa'i khang bzang mngon 'dzegs sku gnyis kyis //
T02D1351:220b-6: phan pa sna tshogs sgrub pa zlos gar gar rnams ni //
T02D1351:220b-7: nye bar mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1351:220b-8: dri med 'od sogs gsung gi chu blangs skom pa ni //
T02D1351:220b-9: nye bar zhi ba sgrub phyir chu gter chu 'thor bzhin ;
T02D1351:220b-10: / mdor bstan gsang ba'i tshig gi lam gyi mtsho phran 'dir //
T02D1351:220b-11: bdag gis rnam par gtor ro mkhas rnams bsten par mdzod //
T02D1351:220b-12: zla ba bzang pos gsol pa zhes pa chu bo
T02D1351:220b-13: sh'i ta'i byang phyogs na grong bye ba phrag dgu
T02D1351:220b-14: bcu rtsa drug dang shambhala'i yul gyi bdag po /
T02D1351:220b-15: lha dang lha ma yin dang klu'i sprul pa'i sku
T02D1351:220b-16: rgyal po chen po'i rigs kyi sras dgu bcu rtsa
T02D1351:220b-17: drug rin po che chen po'i cod pan bcings pa
T02D1351:220b-18: grong bye ba bye ba'i bdag po rnams kyis zhabs
T02D1351:220b-19: kyi padma la phyag byas pa /
T02D1351:220b-20: sems can thams cad kyi skad gzhan rnams kyis de
T02D1351:220b-21: bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos rnams kyi yang dag
T02D1351:220b-22: par 'dzin pa po nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1351:220b-23: thams cad kyi nyan pa por gyur pa nyid kyi
T02D1351:220b-24: phyir dang / cha bcu drug gi sgrib pa spangs
T02D1351:220b-25: pas rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od nyid kyi
T02D1351:220b-26: phyir bzang po yang 'di yin la /
T02D1351:220b-27: zla ba yang yin pas zla ba bzang po ste /
T02D1351:220b-28: gsang ba pa'i bdag po ro ldan na gnas pa dpal phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1351:220b-29: de la gsang ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
T02D1351:220b-30: rgyas kyi theg pa dag gi mchog rdo rje theg
T02D1351:220b-31: pa ste / de'i sdud par byed pa po nyid kyis bdag po'o //
T02D1351:220b-32: de bzhin du 'jig rten kun rdzob tu gsang ba'i sgras gnod sbyin rnams te /
T02D1351:220b-33: de rnams kyi bdag po ni gsang ba'i bdag bo'o ;
T02D1351:220b-34: / phyi rol du ro'i skras shi ba'i tshogs de
T02D1351:220b-35: de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro ldan dur khrod kyi
T02D1351:220b-36: sa'o // de na gnod sbyin chen po sems can
T02D1351:220b-37: rnams la rnam par tho 'tsham zhing bgegs du ma
T02D1351:220b-39: de rnams gsod par byed pa ni ro ldan na
T02D1351:220b-40: gnas pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po ste
T02D1351:221a-0: / @221a * // nags kyi ri dags kyi bdag po bzhin no //
T02D1351:221a-1: nang du ni dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa drug
T02D1351:221a-2: brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya
T02D1351:221a-3: phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis dman pa 'gog pa
T02D1351:221a-4: ro yin la / de 'di la yod pa'i phyir ro ldan te chos kyi sprin gyis sa'o //
T02D1351:221a-5: de la gnas pa ni ro ldan na gnas pa'o //
T02D1351:221a-6: bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa
T02D1351:221a-7: dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa'i gnod sbyin rnams
T02D1351:221a-8: gsod par byed pa ni gnod sbyin gyi bdag po
T02D1351:221a-9: ste / de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi seng ge'i
T02D1351:221a-10: sgra dang sems can thams cad kyi so so'i sgra
T02D1351:221a-11: dag gis bstan pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston par
T02D1351:221a-12: byad pa po gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na
T02D1351:221a-14: de'i sprul pa'i sku rgyal po zla ba bzang pos gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02D1351:221a-15: de rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1351:221a-16: mdun gyi nya ba zla bar te //
T02D1351:221a-17: rgyab kyi nya ba nyi ma la'o //
T02D1351:221a-18: g-yon gyi mun can gdong pa la //
T02D1351:221a-19: g-yas kyi mjug mar gnas pa ni //
T02D1351:221a-20: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal ba //
T02D1351:221a-21: zhes bya bdud ni 'joms pa'i dus //
T02D1351:221a-22: der ni ston pa shar gyi zhal //
T02D1351:221a-23: rin chen seng ge'i khri la bzhugs //
T02D1351:221a-24: 'od zer lnga yi tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D1351:221a-25: 'gro ba gsum po rab bkang ste //
T02D1351:221a-26: byang chub sems dpa' lha min dbang //
T02D1351:221a-27: lha dbang rnams kyi sa lha yi gdugs //
T02D1351:221a-28: lha yi me tog sna tshogs dang //
T02D1351:221a-29: lha yi dri bzang yid 'phrog dang //
T02D1351:221a-30: lha yi rin chen sgron ma dang //
T02D1351:221a-31: lha yi bdug pa dri bzang skyes //
T02D1351:221a-32: lha yi phye ma sna tshogs dang //
T02D1351:221a-33: zhal zas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang //
T02D1351:221a-34: lha yi rnam par bkra ba'i rgyan //
T02D1351:221a-35: lha yi gos dang rnga yab dang //
T02D1351:221a-36: dri la bu me long ba dan dang //
T02D1351:221a-37: bla re rnams kyis gtso bo mchod //
T02D1351:221a-38: cod pan ldan pa'i yan lag lngas //
T02D1351:221a-39: yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1351:221a-40: byang chub sems dpa' 'chi med sogs //
T02D1351:221a-41: rang dang stan la 'khod de rnams //
T02D1351:221a-43: / sngags kyi theg pa thos don gnyer //
T02D1351:221a-44: byang chub sems dpa' lha la sogs //
T02D1351:221a-45: kha cig mngon shes la thob pa //
T02D1351:221a-46: de rnams thams cad dga' mgu yi //
T02D1351:221a-47: bsam pas yod kyis sems par byed //
T02D1351:221a-48: mar me mdzad kyis sngon du gang //
T02D1351:221a-49: sngags kyi thig le pa bstan pa yis //
T02D1351:221b-0: bdag @221b cag bya ba mdzad do deng //
T02D1351:221b-1: goo ta ma legs pa yis //
T02D1351:221b-3: phyag na rdo rje'i sprul ba ni //
T02D1351:221b-4: mi bdag zla bzang rdu 'phrul gyis //
T02D1351:221b-5: rang nyid dpal ldan chos dbyings byon //
T02D1351:221b-6: dang por g-yas su bskor byas nas //
T02D1351:221b-7: ston pa'i zhabs kyi chu skyes gnyis //
T02D1351:221b-8: rin chen me tog rnams kyis mchod //
T02D1351:221b-9: yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1351:221b-10: thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas //
T02D1351:221b-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'dug / zla ba rgyud kyi gsol 'debs dang //
T02D1351:221b-12: ston pa sdud par byed pa po //
T02D1351:221b-14: yang dag par ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis kye ston pa zhes bod pa'o //
T02D1351:221b-15: gang zhig 'chad par 'gyur ba chu la sogs pa
T02D1351:221b-16: dbang bskur ba rnam pa bdun dang bum pa la
T02D1351:221b-17: sogs pa rnams pa gsum dang bla na med ces
T02D1351:221b-18: pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba ste de bzhin zhes
T02D1351:221b-20: 'dis 'khrud cing lus la sogs pa dri ma med
T02D1351:221b-21: pa dang sgrib pa med par byed pa'i phyir dbang
T02D1351:221b-22: bskur ba ste / de bdag la gsungs zhes pa'o //
T02D1351:221b-23: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub ces pa 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar thug pa'i bdag po dang /
T02D1351:221b-24: 'das pa'i dngos grub ces pa nyon mongs pa dang
T02D1351:221b-25: shes bya dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa bag
T02D1351:221b-26: chags dang bcas pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa
T02D1351:221b-27: las sa bcu gnyis so sor thob pas yang dag
T02D1351:221b-28: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de /
T02D1351:221b-30: mdor bsdus pa yis zhes pa gsol ba 'debs pa po nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D1351:221b-34: tshe'i mtshan nyid snyigs ma lngas nye bar bcom pa'i
T02D1351:221b-35: skye bo rnams rjes su 'dzin pa la rab tu
T02D1351:221b-37: dbang bskur ba'i le'u dang ye shes kyi le'ur rgya cher bshad par 'gyur pa'i phyir yang ngo //
T02D1351:221b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa khams
T02D1351:221b-39: drug rnam par dag pa las dbang phyug la sogs
T02D1351:221b-40: pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid kyi bha ga 'di
T02D1351:221b-41: la yod pa'i phyir bha ga w'an no //
T02D1351:221b-42: de rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1351:221b-43: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang //
T02D1351:221b-44: grags dang dpal dang ye shes dang //
T02D1351:221b-45: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste //
T02D1351:222a-0: drug rnams bha ga zhes brjod @222a * //
T02D1351:222a-2: / rnam dag sum cu rtsa drug khams //
T02D1351:222a-3: sa sogs rdo rje btsun mo ste //
T02D1351:222a-4: de rnams dbang phyug sogs yon tan //
T02D1351:222a-5: drug po de rnams bha gar grags //
T02D1351:222a-8: 'joms byed bha ga zhes grags te //
T02D1351:222a-9: nyon mongs bdud sogs 'joms pa'i phyir ;
T02D1351:222a-10: / nyon mongs gsod pa shes rab ste //
T02D1351:222a-11: de'i phyir shes rab bha gar brjod //
T02D1351:222a-13: gnas gang du ci zhig / dkyil 'khor gang du //
T02D1351:222a-15: 'khor su yis yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na /
T02D1351:222a-16: dpal ldan 'bras phung du nges par sngags kyi tshul bstan pa ste /
T02D1351:222a-17: gnas bde ba chen po'i gnas su rdo rje dbyings
T02D1351:222a-18: kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rdo rje seng+ge'i khri la
T02D1351:222a-19: ba zhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1351:222a-20: dang khro bo dang lha dang klu dang lha mo'i
T02D1351:222a-21: tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1351:222a-22: khams gsum pas zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas pa ;
T02D1351:222a-23: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa /
T02D1351:222a-24: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid bam yig
T02D1351:222a-25: go / yang na bde ba chen po'i gnas der
T02D1351:222a-26: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la mchog tu
T02D1351:222a-27: mi 'gyur ba mi 'pho ba'i skad cig ni dus
T02D1351:222a-28: zhes brjod de de nyid rdo rje ye shes so
T02D1351:222a-29: // dus de'i sgrib pa med pa'i phung po dang /
T02D1351:222a-30: khams dang skye mched ni 'khor lo ste srid pa
T02D1351:222a-31: gsum gcig pa nyid kyi phyir sgrib pa med pa'i
T02D1351:222a-32: shes bya'o // de nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po zhes brjod de //
T02D1351:222a-33: rnam pa thams cad pa dang dbang po thams cad
T02D1351:222a-34: pa thig le'i gzugs sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa
T02D1351:222a-35: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1351:222a-37: mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa zla ba dang
T02D1351:222a-38: nyi ma dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid dam
T02D1351:222a-39: / ae yig gi mtshan nyid rdo rje seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1351:222a-40: rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1351:222a-41: ston pas bya rgod phung po ru //
T02D1351:222a-42: shes rab pha rol phyin tshul bzhin //
T02D1351:222a-43: chos bstan dpal ldan 'bras phung du //
T02D1351:222a-44: de bzhin gsang sngags tshul rab gsungs //
T02D1351:222a-45: gang la gnas nas ston pa ni /
T02D1351:222a-46: su yis rgyud kyang ci zhig bstan //
T02D1351:222b-0: gnas ni gang du 'jig rten @222b pa'i ;
T02D1351:222b-1: /'khor ni su yis rgyu ci yis /
T02D1351:222b-2: bya rgod phung po'i ri chen por //
T02D1351:222b-3: theg pa chen po bla na med //
T02D1351:222b-4: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02D1351:222b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan //
T02D1351:222b-6: de nas gcig tu mchod rten cher //
T02D1351:222b-7: chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1351:222b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sogs rnams kyis //
T02D1351:222b-9: thabs cig de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs //
T02D1351:222b-10: nam mkha' khams min shin tu dang //
T02D1351:222b-11: go skabs med pa rab tu gsal //
T02D1351:222b-12: sna tshogs rdo rje'i khang par gnas //
T02D1351:222b-13: chos kyi dbyings dang yi 'od par //
T02D1351:222b-14: rgyud bstan skyes bu rnams kyis ni ;
T02D1351:222b-15: / bsod rnams ye shes dgos pa'o //
T02D1351:222b-16: ae yig nam mkha'i snang ba che //
T02D1351:222b-17: chos kyi dbyings su rab tu grags //
T02D1351:222b-18: bam yig bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs //
T02D1351:222b-19: ai yig rnam par yang dag gnas //
T02D1351:222b-22: ae dang gsang chen nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1351:222b-23: bha ga chos 'byung chu skyes dang //
T02D1351:222b-24: seng ge'i khrir gnas rdo rje can //
T02D1351:222b-25: rgyud gzhan dag tu bdag gis brjod //
T02D1351:222b-26: rdo rje rdo rje can ni bam //
T02D1351:222b-27: rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug gang //
T02D1351:222b-28: he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo //
T02D1351:222b-29: dang po'i sangs rgyas sogs ming gis //
T02D1351:222b-30: sna tshogs sems can bsam pa ya //
T02D1351:222b-31: sna tshogs yum gyi ming rnams kyis //
T02D1351:222b-32: gnas dang rten gyi mtshan nyid dang //
T02D1351:222b-33: brten pa yang ni bdag gis brjod //
T02D1351:222b-34: kun mkhyen ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1351:222b-35: sangs rgyas seng ge'i khrir bzhugs pa /
T02D1351:222b-36: dus kyi 'khor lo'i ston pa po //
T02D1351:222b-37: zla bzang khyod kyis gsol btab pa //
T02D1351:222b-39: nyin cig zla bzang zhes pa la sogs pa nas
T02D1351:222b-40: mdor bstan pa rdzogs so zhes pa'i bar bcom ldan
T02D1351:222b-42: dbang bskur don zhes pa dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1351:222b-44: mchog ces pa mchog tu mi 'gyur pa ste /
T02D1351:222b-45: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i thabs nyid kyi phyir gsol ba ma btab par yang ngo //
T02D1351:222b-46: rtsa'i kun spyod la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D1351:222b-47: rtsa'i kun spyod ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1351:222b-48: steng dang 'og tu la n'a la sogs pa rtsa
T02D1351:222b-49: drug po rnams su srog dang thur sel gyi rlung
T02D1351:222b-50: dag 'chang par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas yang dag par
T02D1351:223a-1: rtsol ba ni zhes pas mu nye bar 'gag ba
T02D1351:223a-2: la'o zhes pa'i khams 'di'i aa sa ta ya ma
T02D1351:223a-4: srog dang thur sel gyi rlung dag gnyi ga'i bgrod
T02D1351:223a-5: pa 'gog pa las dbu ma'i rtsar rab tu zhugs
T02D1351:223a-6: pa'o // mdor bstan pa yis zhes pa mdor bsdus pas so //
T02D1351:223a-7: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa'i rgyud
T02D1351:223a-8: nyid thams cad du mdor bstan pa rnam pa gsum
T02D1351:223a-9: ste rgyas par bshad pa yang ngo //
T02D1351:223a-10: de lam dor bstan pa ni rang ming nyid kyis brjod pa'o //
T02D1351:223a-11: rab tu mdor bstan pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D1351:223a-12: mdor bstan che ba ni gsum pa'o //
T02D1351:223a-13: de bzhin du rgyas par bshad pa yang rang ming nyid kyis brjod pa'o //
T02D1351:223a-14: rab tu rgyas par bshad pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D1351:223a-15: gzhan zhes pa rgyas par bshad pa chen po ste gsum pa'o //
T02D1351:223a-17: rgyas par bshad pa gnyis nyid dag ni rgyud yang dag par bsdus pa ste /
T02D1351:223a-18: de la mdor bstan pas yang dag par bsdus pa
T02D1351:223a-19: ni bsdus pa'i rgyud mtha' dag ste dper na brgya
T02D1351:223a-20: phrag bco brgyad pa'i gzhung dpal 'dus pa la sogs
T02D1351:223a-21: pa'o // rgyas par bshad pas yang dag par bsdus
T02D1351:223a-22: pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal pos bstan pa
T02D1351:223a-23: mtha' dag ste dper na stong phrag nyi shu rtsa
T02D1351:223a-24: lnga pa'i dpal 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:223a-25: de bzhin du rab tu mdor bstan pas bsdus pa'i rgyud la dka' 'grel lo //
T02D1351:223a-26: 'dir rgyas par bshad pa ni rab tu rgyas bshad
T02D1351:223a-27: du mngon par 'dod de de'i rtsa ba'i rgyud la
T02D1351:223a-28: dka' 'grel lo // de bzhin du mdor bstan chen pos rgyud la 'grel bshad do ;
T02D1351:223a-29: /'dir rgyas par bshad pa ni rgyas bshad chen por
T02D1351:223a-30: mngon par 'dod de rgyas bshad chen pos rtsa ba'i
T02D1351:223a-32: de rnams ni slar yang dag par bsdus pa dang dka' 'grel dang 'grel bshad rnams so //
T02D1351:223a-33: de yang mngon shes thob rnams kyis //
T02D1351:223a-34: zhes pa lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang gzhan
T02D1351:223a-35: gyi sems shes pa dang rang dang gzhan gyi sngon
T02D1351:223a-36: gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang nam mkha' la
T02D1351:223a-37: 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa rnams nyid kyis bya'o
T02D1351:223a-38: // mkhas pa rnams kyis min nyid ces pa rtog
T02D1351:223a-39: ge skam po sbyangs pas nye bar dub pa sems
T02D1351:223b-0: so so @223b rang gis rig par bya ba nang
T02D1351:223b-1: gi bdag nyid brjod pa la kha phyir phyogs pa
T02D1351:223b-2: rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1351:223b-3: de ltar zhes pa brjod pa'i rim pas mtha' drug
T02D1351:223b-4: rnams kyis mdor bstan pa la sogs pa rnam pa
T02D1351:223b-5: drug rnams kyis dag pa ni yongs su dag pa
T02D1351:223b-6: ste / 'di ni dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud /
T02D1351:223b-7: dus kyi 'khor lo mngon rjod byed //
T02D1351:223b-8: 'gyur ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba dang 'brel lo //
T02D1351:223b-9: de bzhin rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi yis //
T02D1351:223b-10: dag pa zhes thams cad du sprel bar bya'o //
T02D1351:223b-11: rnam par dag pa dang chos dang sngags dang dbyibs
T02D1351:223b-12: kyi bdag nyid rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis te
T02D1351:223b-13: // stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
T02D1351:223b-14: smon pa med pa dang mngon par 'dus ma byas
T02D1351:223b-15: pa ste rnam par thar pa rnams snying rje dang
T02D1351:223b-16: byams pa dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te /
T02D1351:223b-17: tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis lhan cig rim pas ro mnyam pa'i dngos po'i gzugs rnams dang /
T02D1351:223b-18: bzlog par dka' ba'i 'dod chags kyi dri mas bsgos
T02D1351:223b-19: pa dbang po gnyis kyi bdag nyid bzhi pa dang
T02D1351:223b-20: mun pas zil gyis mnan pa shin tu gnyid log

T02D1351:223b-28: stong pa de'i dngos po ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D1351:223b-29: 'dir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i shes bya ni stong pa'o //
T02D1351:223b-30: de'i dngos po mthong ba ni stong pa nyid de zab pa dang rgya che ba'o //
T02D1351:223b-31: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa med pa'i phyir zab pa'o //
T02D1351:223b-32: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rgya che ba'i phyir rgya che ba'o //

T02D1351:223b-34: ye shes ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar
T02D1351:223b-35: pa'o // des rnam par dag pa bzhi pa'i gnas
T02D1351:223b-36: skabs zad pa las mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen
T02D1351:223b-37: pa'o // po'o // kam bde ba 'gog par byed
T02D1351:223b-38: do zhes pa snying rje'i mtshan nyid ye shes rdo
T02D1351:223b-39: pa'o // po'o // rje ste / de nyid lhan

T02D1351:223b-41: nyid rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do

T02D1351:224a-1: * // / rgyu stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyu
T02D1351:224a-2: med la de'i phyir gang la mtshan ma med pa
T02D1351:224a-3: ni mtshan ma med pa'i ye shes mtshan ma med
T02D1351:224a-5: des rnam par dag pa shin tu gnyid log zad
T02D1351:224a-6: pa las rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs

T02D1351:224a-9: pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sems thugs rdo
T02D1351:224a-10: rje ste / de nyid chos kyi sku shes rab
T02D1351:224a-11: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod

T02D1351:224a-14: ni smon pa med pa ste /

T02D1351:224a-16: cig ces pa la sogs pa yin la gang la
T02D1351:224a-17: de med pa ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par

T02D1351:224a-19: zad pa las mi zad cing gzhom du med pa'i
T02D1351:224a-20: sgra sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi bdag nyid
T02D1351:224a-21: kyi sngags dga' ba'i mtshan nyid sems can thams cad
T02D1351:224a-22: kyi skad rnams kyis sems can thams cad dga' bar
T02D1351:224a-23: byed pa'i phyir dang yid skyob par byed pa'i phyir
T02D1351:224a-24: yang sngags gsung rdo rje ste /

T02D1351:224a-26: thabs kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod
T02D1351:224a-27: do // smon pa med pa'i phyir gang la dkar po dang srog gi rtsol ba dang /
T02D1351:224a-28: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par 'du byed
T02D1351:224a-29: pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam par
T02D1351:224a-30: thar pa'o // des rnam par dag pa sad pa'i
T02D1351:224a-31: gnas skabs zad pa las mtha' yas pa mtha' yas
T02D1351:224a-32: pa'i sprul pa'i sku spros pa rnams kyis nyon mongs
T02D1351:224a-33: pa'i gnyen po las 'dren par byed pa drag po
T02D1351:224a-34: dang chags pa dang bcas pa dang zhi ba la
T02D1351:224a-35: sogs pa'i gzugs rnams kyis dog pa med pa btang
T02D1351:224a-36: snyoms kyi bdag nyid sku rdo rje ste /
T02D1351:224a-37: de nyid sprul pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dbyibs kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
T02D1351:224a-38: de dri ma med pa'i 'od du tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i bshad par gsungs pa /
T02D1351:224a-39: de nyid lhan cig tu skyes pa'i sku stong pa
T02D1351:224a-40: nyid kyi rnam par thar pas rnam par dag pa
T02D1351:224a-41: ye shes rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pa shes rab
T02D1351:224b-0: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rnam @224b par dag pa'i
T02D1351:224b-2: de nyid chos kyi sku mtshan ma med pa'i rnam
T02D1351:224b-3: par thar pas rnam par dag pa thugs rdo rje
T02D1351:224b-4: ye shes sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1351:224b-5: chos kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do
T02D1351:224b-6: // de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku smon pa
T02D1351:224b-7: med pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par dag pa
T02D1351:224b-8: gsung rdo rje nyid mor byed pa'i sku shes rab
T02D1351:224b-9: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor zhes brjod do
T02D1351:224b-10: // // de nyid sprul pa'i sku mngon par 'dus
T02D1351:224b-11: ma byas pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par dag
T02D1351:224b-12: pa sku rdo rje padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan
T02D1351:224b-13: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dbyings kyi rnal
T02D1351:224b-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhin rnams kyis //
T02D1351:224b-16: zhes pa skad cig gcig dang rnam pa lnga dang
T02D1351:224b-17: rnam pa nyi shu dang sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon
T02D1351:224b-18: par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis
T02D1351:224b-19: so // de la mngal nas skyes pa bskyed pa'i
T02D1351:224b-20: rim pas pha ma gnyis ka'i thig le ro mnyam
T02D1351:224b-21: par gyur pa dang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa
T02D1351:224b-22: ma'i gsang pa'i 'khor lor zhugs pa na /
T02D1351:224b-23: skad cig gcig gis bde ba 'ba' zhig yang dag par rig pa dang /
T02D1351:224b-24: lus kyang nya ro hi ta ltar rnam pa gcig
T02D1351:224b-25: pa gang yin pa de skad cig gcig gis mngon
T02D1351:224b-26: par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o //
T02D1351:224b-27: gang gi tshe mngal na gnas pa de nyid kyi
T02D1351:224b-28: gzugs la sogs pa'i bag chags kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1351:224b-29: shes pa lnga yang dag par rig cing rus sbal
T02D1351:224b-30: ltar 'bur po rnam pa lnga 'thon pa de'i tshe
T02D1351:224b-31: rnam pa lngas rdzogs par byang chub pa'o //
T02D1351:224b-32: de nas gang gi tshe shes pa lnga po rnams
T02D1351:224b-33: kyi so sor rang gi sa la sogs pa khams
T02D1351:224b-34: bzhi bag chags kyi dbye bas lus kyang sor mo
T02D1351:224b-35: nyi shu yongs su rdzogs pa de'i tshe rnam pa
T02D1351:224b-36: nyi shu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o //
T02D1351:224b-37: de nas mngal nas 'thon te sgyu ma'i dra ba
T02D1351:224b-38: ltar mtha' yas pa'i dngos po yang dag par rig
T02D1351:224b-39: pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par
T02D1351:224b-40: byang chub pa'o // de'i chos mi mthun pas dag
T02D1351:224b-41: pa ye shes rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thig
T02D1351:224b-42: le 'pho ba med pa rang bzhin gyi sku ye
T02D1351:224b-43: shes rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rdo rje sems dpa' don
T02D1351:225a-0: skad cig gcig gis mngon par rdzogs @225a * //
T02D1351:225a-1: par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:225a-2: skad cig gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D1351:225a-3: pa ni 'dir dbugs drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag
T02D1351:225a-4: nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1351:225a-5: de dbugs kyi 'khor lo bzang po zad pa'i phyir
T02D1351:225a-6: ro // rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang /
T02D1351:225a-7: rgyal dbang rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas //
T02D1351:225a-8: dus gcig 'gyur ba med pa dang //
T02D1351:225a-9: srog chen po dang sems gnas dang //
T02D1351:225a-10: srog rlung dang par son pa dang //
T02D1351:225a-11: lha yi dbang por gyur pa dang //
T02D1351:225a-12: sha yi dbang po'i tshogs nyams dang //
T02D1351:225a-13: tha mal skye mched nyams pa dang //
T02D1351:225a-14: lha yi skye mched kyis mthong na //
T02D1351:225a-15: thams cad blta'o rgyal po'i dbang //
T02D1351:225a-16: bdag la rtag tu mi mthong med //
T02D1351:225a-18: de nyid chos kyi sku thugs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
T02D1351:225a-19: sems dpa' chen po mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde
T02D1351:225a-20: ba ste / rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:225a-21: rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
T02D1351:225a-22: ni 'dir me long lta bu la sogs pa ye
T02D1351:225a-23: shes lnga'i mtshan nyid des la sogs pa khams dang
T02D1351:225a-24: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga shes rab dang

T02D1351:225a-28: rnal 'byor byang chub sems dpa' bden don rnam pa
T02D1351:225a-29: bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su
T02D1351:225a-30: 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad kyi skad rnams kyis
T02D1351:225a-31: chos ston pa po ste rnam pa nyi shus mngon
T02D1351:225a-32: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:225a-33: rnam pa nyi shus mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D1351:225a-34: pa ni 'dir dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang
T02D1351:225a-35: las kyi dbang po lnga dang las kyi dbang po'i
T02D1351:225a-36: bya ba lnga sgrib pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de
T02D1351:225a-37: 'pho ba bcu gnyis 'gog pa'i mthu las rnam par
T02D1351:225a-38: shes par bya'o // de nyid sprul pa'i sku sku
T02D1351:225a-39: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dam tshig sems dpa' de nyid
T02D1351:225a-40: rnam pa bcu drug rig pa lha la sogs pa
T02D1351:225a-41: rnams rjes su 'dzin pa mtha' yas pa'i sgyu 'phrul
T02D1351:225a-42: dra ba la rnams kyis spros pa'i sku ste sgyu
T02D1351:225a-43: 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
T02D1351:225a-44: shes par bya'o // phyir ro // sgyu 'phrul dra
T02D1351:225b-0: bas mngon par rdzogs @225b par byang chub pa ni
T02D1351:225b-1: 'dir cig car mtha' yas shing mthar thug pa med

T02D1351:225b-3: de'i sku'i dga' ba la sogs pa'i thig le bcu
T02D1351:225b-4: drug 'gog pa las rnam par shes par bya'o //
T02D1351:225b-5: rdzogs pa'i rim pas ni du ba la sogs pa
T02D1351:225b-6: mtshan ma bcu po rnams kyi chung du dang 'bring
T02D1351:225b-7: dang chen po dang shin tu chen po'i dbye bas
T02D1351:225b-9: phung po rnams kyi ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang
T02D1351:225b-10: 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa
T02D1351:225b-11: dang ye shes rnams kyis so //
T02D1351:225b-12: khams rnams kyi ni sa dang chu dang me dang
T02D1351:225b-13: rlung dang nam mkha' dang ye shes rnams kyis so
T02D1351:225b-14: // skye mched rnams kyi ni lus dang lce dang
T02D1351:225b-15: mig dang sna dang rna ba dang yid rnams dang
T02D1351:225b-16: dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya dang sgra
T02D1351:225b-17: dang chos kyi dbyings rnams kyis so //
T02D1351:225b-18: mang po'i tshig las bshad lam dang rkang pa dang
T02D1351:225b-19: lag pa dang dag dang gcig ba'i lam dang dung
T02D1351:225b-21: bshang ba 'dzag pa dang 'gro ba dang len pa
T02D1351:225b-22: dang brjod pa dang dri chu 'dzag pa dang khu
T02D1351:225b-24: rnam par snang ba mdzad la sogs pa rnams par dag pas so //
T02D1351:225b-25: so sor rigs drug po 'di rnams kyis so //
T02D1351:225b-26: 'jig rten khams dang nang dang mngon par dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1351:225b-27: sgrub thabs dang ye shes zhes bya ba'i le'u lnga
T02D1351:225b-28: po snod kyi 'jig rten dang sems can gyi 'jig
T02D1351:225b-29: rten dang sems can sbyong bar byed pa dang 'jig
T02D1351:225b-30: rten pa'i dngos grub pa sgrub pa dang mchog tu
T02D1351:225b-31: mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi don rab tu gsal
T02D1351:225b-32: bar byed pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1351:225b-33: bdan [?] gnyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag gis so //
T02D1351:225b-34: dang po'i sgra ni thog ma dang tha med pa'i don to //
T02D1351:225b-35: chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas so //
T02D1351:225b-36: dang po 'di yin la sangs rgyas kyang yin pas
T02D1351:225b-37: dang pa'i sangs rgyas te skye ba dang 'jig pa
T02D1351:225b-38: dang bral pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes pa'i don
T02D1351:225b-39: to // mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang /
T02D1351:225b-40: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
T02D1351:225b-41: dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med pa //
T02D1351:225b-43: snying rje dang ni stong nyid sku //
T02D1351:225b-44: dus ni kun rdzob gzugs can ma //
T02D1351:226a-4: ming gi yi ge re re ste //
T02D1351:226a-5: k'a yig las ni rgyu zhi ba //
T02D1351:226a-6: la yig las 'dir thim pa nyin //
T02D1351:226a-7: tsa yig las ni g-yo ba'i sems //
T02D1351:226a-8: kra yig rim pa bcings las so //
T02D1351:226a-10: rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems te lus zhes brjod do //
T02D1351:226a-11: zhi ba ni sad pa'i gnas skabs zad pas rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D1351:226a-12: dpral bar lus kyi thig le 'gog pa las sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1351:226a-13: de ltar gyur pa la rmi lam gyi gnas skabs zad pa'i bdag nyid srog thim pa ste /
T02D1351:226a-14: mgrin par dag gi thig le 'gog pa las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1351:226a-15: sad pa dang rmi lam gyi gnas skabs su sgra
T02D1351:226a-16: la sogs pa'i yul rnams 'ba' zhig don du gnyer
T02D1351:226a-17: ba 'pho ba'i chos can mun pas zil gyis mnan
T02D1351:226a-18: pa'i sems ni khams bco brgyad kyi rnam par 'gyur
T02D1351:226a-19: ba rnams rdzogs pa de'i bcings pa mun pa dang
T02D1351:226a-20: bral ba shin tu gnyid log pa sad pa ste
T02D1351:226a-21: snying gar sems kyi thig le 'gog pa las chos
T02D1351:226a-22: kyi sku'o // 'di gang las she na /
T02D1351:226a-23: gsungs pa kra yig las zhes so //
T02D1351:226a-24: rim pa ni lus la sogs pa'i thig le rnams kyi 'pho ba yin la /
T02D1351:226a-25: de bcings pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas
T02D1351:226a-26: bzhi pa'i gnas skabs zad pa ste lte bar g-yo
T02D1351:226a-27: ba'i bgrod pa ye shes kyi thig le 'gog pa
T02D1351:226a-28: las lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'o zhes pa sku bzhi'i
T02D1351:226a-29: bdag nyid do // de nyid bcom ldan 'das dus
T02D1351:226a-30: kyi 'khor lo shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1351:226a-31: shes pa dang shes bya'i 'brel pas ji lta ba
T02D1351:226a-33: 'gyur med bad ba'i ye shes sgrib pa thams cad
T02D1351:226a-34: zad pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni dus zhes brjod de
T02D1351:226a-35: / thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid mngon par shes pa drug gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1351:226a-36: 'khor lo shes bya'i rnam 'gro shes bya khams gsum
T02D1351:226a-37: pa mtha' yas pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni 'khor
T02D1351:226a-38: lo ste / de nyid shes rab stong nyid bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1351:226a-39: 'di dag gcig pa nyid ni dus kyi 'khor lo zhes brjod de /
T02D1351:226a-41: mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med
T02D1351:226a-42: yon tan rnams dang nam mkha' la sogs khams rnams
T02D1351:226b-0: dang // gnas dang skye dang nyams @226b pa rnam
T02D1351:226b-1: gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug
T02D1351:226b-3: sangs rgyas khro bo la sogs rnams dang snying rje'i
T02D1351:226b-4: thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams
T02D1351:226b-5: te // 'di rnams srid pa gsum po rnams kyis
T02D1351:226b-6: phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig phu'i 'khor lo
T02D1351:226b-7: te // gcig yin no // zhes so //
T02D1351:226b-8: dang por zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis ni gsal lo //
T02D1351:226b-9: da ni chu dang zhes pa la sogs pas dbang bdun mdor bstan te /
T02D1351:226b-10: 'dir rgyud ma thos pa nyid kyi phyir las dang
T02D1351:226b-11: po pa rab tu ma rtogs pa'i blo can rnams
T02D1351:226b-12: kyis rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1351:226b-13: dpal ldan rgyud dang dri ma med pa'i 'od las
T02D1351:226b-14: kyang dbang bdun la sogs pa'i cho ga cung zad
T02D1351:226b-15: blang bar bya'o // de la re zhig dang por slob ma bsrung ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
T02D1351:226b-16: slob ma'i mgo bo snying ga de bzhin gtsug tor
T02D1351:226b-17: lte ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i padmar yang
T02D1351:226b-18: // rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur
T02D1351:226b-19: pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba rnams kyis bsrung
T02D1351:226b-20: // byas shing // de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang
T02D1351:226b-21: glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan

T02D1351:234a-26: zangs dang lcags rnon po dang khab len rnams so
T02D1351:234a-27: // de bzhin du rin po che 'bring po rnams

T02D1351:235a-36: byas nas lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D1351:235a-37: de nas dbang bskur gnyis kyis thugs rdo rje sbyangs
T02D1351:235a-38: nas ye shes rnam par dag pa'i don du g-yas
T02D1351:235a-39: skor gyis slob ma nub kyi zhal du khrid de
T02D1351:235a-40: rjes su gnang ba'i dbang la skye ba'i gnas lnga
T02D1351:235a-41: rnams su sngags 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1351:235a-42: aom ham ksha:dharm'a tsakra pra warta ka sv'ah'a /
T02D1351:235a-43: dbang bskur byin nas sku gsung thugs ye shes rdo
T02D1351:235a-44: rje rnams dbang bdun gyis rnam par sbyangs te de
T02D1351:235a-45: nas slob ma la lag par rdo rje dang rdo
T02D1351:235a-46: rje dril bu byin nas che ge mo rdo rje
T02D1351:235b-0: de dag gis rdo rje slob dpon @235b te rdo
T02D1351:235b-1: rje dril bu rab tu byin nas //
T02D1351:235b-2: rab mchog snying rje dag pa'i chos ni bstan par bya //
T02D1351:235b-3: zhes pa phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'dis so //
T02D1351:235b-5: nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag la ni srog gcod
T02D1351:235b-6: bya ster la gril la yang bden pa min pa'i
T02D1351:235b-7: tshig / rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog bya
T02D1351:235b-8: mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid la yang gzhan gyi bud
T02D1351:235b-9: med dbrog / chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1351:235b-10: dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la
T02D1351:235b-12: g-yung mo la sogs mtha' dag bud med rnams ni
T02D1351:235b-13: gri gug la yang mkha' yi padmar smad mi bya
T02D1351:235b-14: // sems can dong yi slad du nor dang bcas
T02D1351:235b-15: pa'i lus 'di spyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung
T02D1351:235b-16: // mi bya // rigs kyi bu kye sangs rgyas
T02D1351:235b-17: nyid du 'gyur ba gzhan du mtha' yas bskal bas
T02D1351:235b-19: chu ni sgrol ma la sogs lha mo cod pan
T02D1351:235b-20: zhes pa rgyal ba dpa' bo'i ngar dbyangs nus ma
T02D1351:235b-21: rnams // rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dag dang
T02D1351:235b-22: brtul zhugs dag kyang yul rnams ming ni byams sogs
T02D1351:235b-23: rnams // sbyor ba'o // rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D1351:235b-24: chub dpal mo srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dus kyi 'khor
T02D1351:235b-25: lo rjes su rig pa ste //
T02D1351:235b-26: sdig pa'i dri na 'phrog pa'i dbang bskur bdun po
T02D1351:235b-27: 'di rnams dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab sbyin
T02D1351:235b-29: de ltar dkyil 'khor bdun gyi cho ga byas te /
T02D1351:235b-30: de nas slob ma la sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1351:235b-31: slob dpon gyis rgan pa dang gzhon pa'i don du
T02D1351:235b-32: lo la sogs pa rab tu bsgrags par bya ste
T02D1351:235b-34: rigs ldan gyi rgyal po che ge mo chos ston pa dang /
T02D1351:235b-35: zla ba che ge mo dang /
T02D1351:235b-39: skar ma che ge mo dang /
T02D1351:235b-40: sbyor ba che ge mo dang /
T02D1351:235b-41: byed pa che ge mo la rdo rje slob dpon
T02D1351:235b-42: che ge mo bdag gis slob ma che ge mo
T02D1351:235b-43: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas sam dkyil 'khor gzhan
T02D1351:235b-44: du dbang bdun gyis dbang bskur te /
T02D1351:235b-45: 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar thug pa 'jig rten
T02D1351:235b-46: pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa dang sems can thams cad
T02D1351:236a-1: nams dang ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir
T02D1351:236a-2: bdag gis lung bstan cing rjes su gnang ba'o zhes
T02D1351:236a-3: pa dbang bdun gyi nges pa'o //
T02D1351:236a-4: 'dir rgyud gzhan dang gzhan du byis pa'i skye bo
T02D1351:236a-5: gzhug pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par
T02D1351:236a-7: rnam par snang mdzad kyi chu'i dbang dang rin chen
T02D1351:236a-8: 'byung ldan gyi cod pan no zhes gang gsungs pa
T02D1351:236a-9: de la snga ma dang phyi ma 'gal te /
T02D1351:236a-10: rgyud thams cad du dkyil 'khor du me tog dor
T02D1351:236a-11: ba nas slob ma'i rigs kyi lha gang yin pa
T02D1351:236a-12: de'i cod pan dang de'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas de'i
T02D1351:236a-13: dngos grub po zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges
T02D1351:236a-14: pa'o // de nas mtshan yang dag par brjod par /
T02D1351:236a-15: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can //
T02D1351:236a-17: gang du me tog lhung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de cod pan du 'gyur gyi /
T02D1351:236a-18: thams cad du rin chen 'byung ldan ni ma yin no //
T02D1351:236a-19: de bzhin bsdus pa'i rgyud du chu la sogs pa
T02D1351:236a-20: rnam par dag pa med de cho ga gzhan stobs
T02D1351:236a-22: da ni nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag la ni zhes pa la sogs pa'i don brjod par bya'o //
T02D1351:236a-23: 'dir srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig ni
T02D1351:236a-24: rnam pa gnyis te drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i
T02D1351:236a-25: don gyis phyi rol dang nang gi bdag nyid do
T02D1351:236a-26: // de la phyi rol du bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1351:236a-27: srog gcod pa'i bya ba gang yin pa de ni
T02D1351:236a-28: // / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams dang /
T02D1351:236a-29: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa rnams dang /
T02D1351:236a-30: dam tshig bye ba rnams so zhes pa ste /
T02D1351:236a-31: mtshams med pa lnga po de nyid sngon dang phyi mar shes nas so //
T02D1351:236a-32: 'dir 'ga' zhig sngar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa
T02D1351:236a-33: po phyi nas bsod nams byed pa por 'gyur te
T02D1351:236a-34: / gtum po mya ngan med pa dang chos rgyal mya ngan med pa bzhin no //
T02D1351:236a-35: de phyir de la gnod pa byas na dmyal bar 'gyur te /
T02D1351:236a-36: bsngags pas dge ba dang mi dge ba las yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:236a-37: de nas ji srid mngon par shes pa lngar ma
T02D1351:236a-38: gyur pa de srid du bsngags pas zhi ba dang
T02D1351:236a-39: rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa ma gtogs pa
T02D1351:236a-41: de bzhin du brdzun du smra ba dang ma byin par len pa dang /
T02D1351:236a-42: gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog pa dang /
T02D1351:236b-1: rigs ma yin pa la mngon par 'gro ba dang /
T02D1351:236b-2: rang gi lus kyi mthar thug pa sbyin pa yang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir te /
T02D1351:236b-3: rang gi don du ni ma yin no zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1351:236b-4: gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa de'i tshe /
T02D1351:236b-5: khro bo'i rigs la sngar bsgrub pa'i sngags dang /
T02D1351:236b-6: mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis gsad par bya'o
T02D1351:236b-7: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis drang pa'i don to
T02D1351:236b-8: // de bzhin du lam ma yin par lhung ba
T02D1351:236b-9: rnams mngon par gdon pa'i phyir brdzun gyi tshig smra
T02D1351:236b-11: rang gi don du ni ma yin no //
T02D1351:236b-12: de bzhin du gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog pa ni /
T02D1351:236b-13: dud 'gro'i 'gro bar 'gro ba bzlog pa'i phyir te /
T02D1351:236b-14: rang gi don du ni ma yin no //
T02D1351:236b-15: rigs su 'dzin pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir bdud
T02D1351:236b-16: rtsi lnga la sogs pa dam tshig rnams kyang bsten
T02D1351:236b-17: par bya'o // de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i
T02D1351:236b-18: dngos grub kyi don du g-yung mo la sogs pa
T02D1351:236b-19: bud med rnams la smad par mi bya'o //
T02D1351:236b-20: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi phyir sbyin pa chen po sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1351:236b-21: de ltar ral gri'i rigs dang /
T02D1351:236b-25: gri gug gi rigs la sngags rnams bsgrubs nas nus
T02D1351:236b-26: pa dang ldan par gyur pa na rnal 'byor pas
T02D1351:236b-27: thams cad bya ste ji ltar 'jig rten du bzhad
T02D1351:236b-28: gang du mi 'gyur ba'o zhes pa drang ba'i don
T02D1351:236b-29: to // da ni nges pa'i don brjod par bya'o //
T02D1351:236b-30: 'dir rang gi lus la srog bkag pa ni srog gcod pa ste /
T02D1351:236b-31: rdo rje'i rigs dag la ni ste gtsug tor du dgag par bya'o //
T02D1351:236b-32: srog gcod pa des rnal 'byor pa'i khu ba steng du 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1351:236b-33: ral gri la yang bden pa min pa'i tshig 'dir
T02D1351:236b-34: bden pa min pa zhes bya ba rab tu mi
T02D1351:236b-35: gnas pa'i tshig drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don
T02D1351:236b-36: gyis sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi tshig tu
T02D1351:236b-37: cig car rnams la chos ston pa po ste de
T02D1351:236b-38: nyid snying gar gzhom du med pa'i sgra'o zhes pa
T02D1351:236b-39: nges pa'o // rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog bya zhes pa la /
T02D1351:236b-40: 'dir gzhan ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1351:236b-41: de'i nor ni rin po che ste yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o //
T02D1351:237a-0: de dbrog pa ni rin chen rigs la ste mgrin @237a * //
T02D1351:237a-1: par sa brgyad pa'i gnas su'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1351:237a-2: mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid la yang gzhan gyi bud
T02D1351:237a-3: med dbrog / ces pa la gzhan gyi bud med
T02D1351:237a-4: ni phyag rgya chen mo ste de dbrog pa ni
T02D1351:237a-6: dbrog pa de ni mchog gi padma'i rigs la ste /
T02D1351:237a-7: dpral bar sa bcu pa'i gnas su steng du khu ba'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1351:237a-8: chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams dang bzang po'i
T02D1351:237a-9: yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni brten par
T02D1351:237a-10: bya // zhes pa la ni 'dir chang ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:237a-11: sgron ma ni go ku la sogs pa rnams te nang du ni dbang po lnga rnams so //
T02D1351:237a-12: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdud rtsi lnga rnams so //
T02D1351:237a-13: 'khor lo la ni lte ba'i padmar bsten par bya ni bza' bar bya ste /
T02D1351:237a-14: bshang ba dang gcig ba dang khu ba phyi rol
T02D1351:237a-15: du mi 'dzag par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don
T02D1351:237a-16: to // g-yung mo la sogs pa bud med rnams
T02D1351:237a-17: ni gri gug la ste gsang ba'i padmar smad par
T02D1351:237a-18: to // mi bya'o // mkha'i padmar ni skye gnas
T02D1351:237a-19: su bsrung ba na tshangs par spyod pas te khu
T02D1351:237a-20: ba phyi rol du mi 'pho bas so zhes pa
T02D1351:237a-21: to // mi bya'o // nges pa'o // sems can don gyi slad du sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1351:237a-22: nor dang bcas te bu dang chung ma la sogs
T02D1351:237a-23: pa dang lhan cig tu rang gi lus bsod nams
T02D1351:237a-24: kyi tshogs kyi don du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1351:237a-25: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyi don du
T02D1351:237a-26: bud med rnams la kha'i padmar smad par mi bya'o
T02D1351:237a-27: // de'i phyir bsod nams dang tshul khrims kyi tshogs dag las ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T02D1351:237a-28: de ltar tshogs gsum gyis rigs kyi bu khyod yang
T02D1351:237a-29: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur gyi
T02D1351:237a-30: / gzhan du mtha' yas bskal pas min par gang
T02D1351:237a-31: rgyal bas gsungs pa'o zhes pa rgyud thams cad du
T02D1351:237a-32: rnam par dag pa'i chos bstan pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1351:237a-33: dag pa gzhan yang yod pa de gzhan pa zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs so //
T02D1351:237a-34: 'dir chu'i dbang gang yin pa de ni sa la
T02D1351:237a-35: sogs pa khams lnga po rnams kyi dag pa ni
T02D1351:237a-36: sgrib pa med pa nyid de sgrib pa dang bcas
T02D1351:237a-37: pa'i sa la sogs pa khams lnga po rnams spyan
T02D1351:237a-38: ma la sogs pa'i rig ma lnga po nyid kyis
T02D1351:237b-0: @237b rdzogs pa las chu'i dbang mtshon par byed do
T02D1351:237b-2: de bzhin du cod pan zhes pa cod pan gyi dbang ste /
T02D1351:237b-3: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga rnams sbyong byed
T02D1351:237b-4: ni sgrib pa med pa nyid de gzugs la sogs
T02D1351:237b-5: pa'i phung po lnga po rnams rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1351:237b-6: la sogs pa nyid kyis rdzogs pa cod pan gyi
T02D1351:237b-7: dbang ngo zhes pa ji srid par ro //
T02D1351:237b-8: du ba la sogs pa rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste /
T02D1351:237b-9: de rnams kyis dag pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa
T02D1351:237b-10: so sor dmigs pa ste de'i don dpa' bo'i dar
T02D1351:237b-12: rdo rje mi 'gyur che dril bu sangs rgyas skad
T02D1351:237b-13: dang zhes par sbyar te 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtha'
T02D1351:237b-14: dag gis mi phyed cing des de 'byed pa nyid
T02D1351:237b-15: kyis mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po nyid rdo
T02D1351:237b-16: rje'o // mtha' yas pa'i lha dang mi la sogs
T02D1351:237b-17: pa rnams la de dang de'i skad kyis rgyun mi
T02D1351:237b-18: 'chad par chos kyi bdud rtsi bstan pa'i don du
T02D1351:237b-19: gzhom du med pa'i sgra'i rang bzhin ni rdo rje
T02D1351:237b-20: rje'o // dril bu'o // nyi zla gcig tu zhes
T02D1351:237b-21: pa srog dang thur sel g-yas dang g-yon du 'bab
T02D1351:237b-22: pa dag gcig pa nyid kyis aa wa dh'u t'ir
T02D1351:237b-23: rab tu zhugs pa ste de'i don du rdo rje
T02D1351:237b-24: dang rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i lag pa
T02D1351:237b-25: dag gis 'khyud pa'i tshul byed pa ni rdo rje
T02D1351:237b-26: dang rdo rje dril bu'i dbang ste bzhi pa'o //
T02D1351:237b-27: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang ni gzugs la sogs
T02D1351:237b-28: pa yul dang mig la sogs pa dbang po legs
T02D1351:237b-30: tha mal pa'i yul dang dbang po dang rnam par
T02D1351:237b-31: shes pa rnams 'gags nas lha'i mig la sogs pa
T02D1351:237b-32: dbang po rnams kyis lha'i rnam par shes pa rnams
T02D1351:237b-33: stong pa nyid kyi gzugs kyi yul la bems po
T02D1351:237b-34: ma yin par rab tu 'jug par nges pas phyag
T02D1351:237b-35: rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par byed pa'i phyir
T02D1351:237b-36: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang ste lnga pa'o //
T02D1351:237b-37: bram ze la sogs pa rnams gcig pa nyid kyi
T02D1351:237b-38: dgongs pas che ge mo rdo rje zhes pa ming
T02D1351:237b-39: gi byed pa las byams pa la sogs pa tshangs
T02D1351:237b-40: pa'i gnas bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dus thams cad
T02D1351:237b-41: du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa rnam
T02D1351:237b-42: par dag pa sgrib pa med pa nyid do zhes
T02D1351:237b-43: pa ming gi dbang ste drug pa'o //
T02D1351:238a-0: dpag tu med pa'i sems can gyi khams la bsam pa'i dbang ji lta bar @238a * //
T02D1351:238a-1: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rnam par dbye bas
T02D1351:238a-2: mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje theg pa bstan pa'i
T02D1351:238a-3: don du rjes su gnang ba ni rjes su gnang
T02D1351:238a-4: ba'i dbang sangs rgyas nyid rdzogs par byed pa ste
T02D1351:238a-5: bdun pa'o // dbang bskur bdun po 'di rnams rdul
T02D1351:238a-6: tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par spangs nas gzhan ras
T02D1351:238a-7: bris la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du sbyin par bya
T02D1351:238a-9: bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang rnams ni dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa las gzhan gyis kyang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1351:238a-10: sngar mdor bstan pa'i dbang bcu gcig po rnams kyi
T02D1351:238a-11: nang nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi
T02D1351:238a-12: khang bzangs kyi them skas su gyur pa 'og ma
T02D1351:238a-13: kun rdzob kyi gzugs can dbang bdun po rnams rnam
T02D1351:238a-14: par bshad nas gang zhig rnal 'byor pa la kun
T02D1351:238a-15: rdzob tu gyur pa 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub
T02D1351:238a-16: par byed cing don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D1351:238a-17: dbang gsum po rnams bum pa zhes pa la sogs
T02D1351:238a-19: ji srid phyogs kyi lo ni gcig pa rnam pa
T02D1351:238a-20: bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang ni reg par
T02D1351:238a-21: bya // de nas 'khyud par bya ste ro dang
T02D1351:238a-22: bcas pa'i chu gter g-yo ba la sogs pa rnams
T02D1351:238a-23: bya // bsten par bya // lo ni nyi shu
T02D1351:238a-24: yan chang phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste
T02D1351:238a-25: khro bo 'byung po lha min cha //
T02D1351:238a-26: dbang gi don du drug dang bzhi ste bde mnyam
T02D1351:238a-27: 'bras bu ster ba gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o
T02D1351:238a-28: // dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yang dang
T02D1351:238a-29: por reg pa gang yin de nyid bum pa'i dbang
T02D1351:238a-30: // yin no // gsang ba dag las ri bong
T02D1351:238a-31: 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni lta ba dag gis
T02D1351:238a-33: shes rab ye shes dbang las mtha' dag rgyal ba'i
T02D1351:238a-34: rigs kyi yan lag zhal gyis sbyang ba byas nas
T02D1351:238a-35: ni // rgyal ba dag kyang 'dir ni bla mas
T02D1351:238a-36: dang por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya
T02D1351:238a-37: ni // byin par bya // rgyan rnams thams cad
T02D1351:238a-38: dang ldan zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis
T02D1351:238a-39: lo lon mdzes pa'i bu mo ni //
T02D1351:238a-40: khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1351:238a-41: dag gis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'dod spyad
T02D1351:238a-42: nas // sa bon dang bcas rdo rje dag kyang
T02D1351:238b-0: slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru 'phang @238b
T02D1351:238b-2: phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya de nas
T02D1351:238b-3: slar yang gzhan pa du pa'i lam sogs ldan pa'o
T02D1351:238b-4: // skrag dang rnam par 'khrul pa'i sems ldan g-yo
T02D1351:238b-5: sgyu gzhan dbang 'gro ma nad dang ldan dang bu
T02D1351:238b-6: // skyes ma // khro khengs nor la sred dang
T02D1351:238b-7: mi bden rtsod pa la dga' rang gi yan lag
T02D1351:238b-9: shes rab 'di rnams dbang la shin tu mkhas pa'i
T02D1351:238b-10: bla ma dag gis spang bar bya'o mi yi dbang
T02D1351:238b-11: // sngar brjod sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam
T02D1351:238b-12: tshig 'dzin ma rnams ni phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod

T02D1351:241b-40: // ao ta dang ni n'a da dag dang gnyid
T02D1351:241b-41: dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de ltar bzhi
T02D1351:241b-43: yid la 'dod pa skyes par byed pa de ni
T02D1351:242a-2: de nas gang ba'i gnas skabs ni shes rab la
T02D1351:242a-3: 'khyud pa la sogs pas dpral bar byang chub sems
T02D1351:242a-4: rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir gang ba nyid du 'gyur
T02D1351:242a-5: pa ste gnyis pa mchog dga'o //
T02D1351:242a-6: de nas gang pa yan lag mchog las 'khrig pa
T02D1351:242a-7: la 'bar ba'i gnas skabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa
T02D1351:242a-8: khu bar byas nas thig le 'dzag pa ste gsum
T02D1351:242a-9: pa khyad par dga' bar byed do //
T02D1351:242a-10: de nas ao ta'i gnas skabs ni thig le 'pho
T02D1351:242a-11: ba'i dus su sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi thig
T02D1351:242a-12: le rnams kyi mthar thig le bzhi pa 'byung ba'i
T02D1351:242a-13: dus na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba byed do
T02D1351:242a-14: // de ltar tshes gcig la sogs pa cha lnga
T02D1351:242a-15: lnga po nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu
T02D1351:242a-16: dang sa'i rang bzhin dga' ba dang bzang po dang
T02D1351:242a-17: rgyal ba dang stong ba dang rdzogs pa'i ming can
T02D1351:242a-18: // / aa ai ri au li ka / aa ae aar ao aa la tsa /
T02D1351:242a-19: ha ya ra wa la ta zhes pa'i dbyangs 'di rnams kyi chos can rnams kyis so //
T02D1351:242a-20: de ltar lnga pa ni dga' ba rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1351:242a-21: bcu pa ni mchog dga' rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1351:242a-22: nya ni khyad par dga' ba rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1351:242a-23: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba zhes pa ni cha bcu drug pa ste /
T02D1351:242a-24: khams thams cad sdud pa dang 'du ba dang 'dus pa dang sngom pa'o //
T02D1351:242a-25: de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi chags pa ni
T02D1351:242a-26: dkar po'i phyogs te chags bral ni nag po'i phyogs
T02D1351:242a-27: so // ji ltar mtshan yang dag par brjod par /
T02D1351:242a-28: chags bral dang po chags pa che //
T02D1351:242a-30: / rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1351:242a-31: sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa //
T02D1351:242a-34: rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med //
T02D1351:242a-35: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang //
T02D1351:242a-36: cha med cha las 'das pa po //
T02D1351:242a-37: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang //
T02D1351:242a-38: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1351:242a-39: don dam par phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ni le'u lnga par rgya cher shes par bya ste /
T02D1351:242a-41: da ni 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pa dga'
T02D1351:242a-42: ba bcu drug po rnams kyi sbyor ba bzhi gsungs
T02D1351:242b-0: te / 'dir sems can thams cad @242b kyi sad
T02D1351:242b-1: pa dang rmi lam dang shin tu gnyid log pa
T02D1351:242b-2: dang bzhi pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbye bas sku dang
T02D1351:242b-3: gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi sbyor ba ste
T02D1351:242b-4: de rnams kyang dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas
T02D1351:242b-5: te / bcu drug go // de la 'dod pa zhes pa sku'i dga' pa'o //
T02D1351:242b-6: dga' ba zhes pa gsung gi dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-7: 'dar ba zhes pa thugs kyi dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-8: 'gyur med ces pa'i ming gis ye shes kyi dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-9: de ltar bzhi'i dga' ba ste gcig pa'i sbyor pa'o //
T02D1351:242b-10: de bzhin du gang ba zhes pa sku'i mchog dga'o //
T02D1351:242b-11: 'dir mchog gi dga' ba la sogs pa gsum po
T02D1351:242b-12: rnams mtha' ma la sogs pas gsung dang thugs dang
T02D1351:242b-13: ye shes rdo rje rnams te sdeb sbyor gyi dbang
T02D1351:242b-14: gis so // de phyir mchog gi dga' ba zhes pa gsung gi mchog dga'o //
T02D1351:242b-15: skye ba zhes pa thugs kyi mchog dga'o //
T02D1351:242b-16: nus pa zhes pa ye shes kyi mchog dga'o zhes pa gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-17: 'bar ba zhes pa sku'i khyad par dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-18: khyad par dga' ba zhes pa gsung gi khyad par dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-19: rgyal ba zhes pa thugs kyi khyad par dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-20: thig le zhes pa ye shes kyi khyad par dga' ba'o zhes pa gsum pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-21: de bzhin ao ta zhes pa sku'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-22: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba zhes pa gsung gi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-23: gnyid ces pa thugs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-24: n'a da zhes pa ye shes kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1351:242b-25: de ltar sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang
T02D1351:242b-26: chos dang ngo bo nyid kyi dbye bas sku rnam
T02D1351:242b-27: pa bzhi dang gsung rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D1351:242b-28: de bzhin du thugs rnam pa bzhi dang ye shes rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1351:242b-29: de ltar dga' ba bcu drug gi dbye ba rnams rgya cher dpal ldan rgyud du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1351:242b-30: dga' ba bcu drug gi mtha' lhan cig skyes pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1351:242b-31: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub par byed pa'i dbang rnam
T02D1351:242b-32: pa gsum mdor bstan nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1351:242b-33: dngos grub kyi thun mong ma yin pa dbang bcu
T02D1351:242b-34: gcig pa gsungs pa slar yang zhes pa la sogs
T02D1351:243a-1: shes rab chen po zhes pa rnam par rtog pa
T02D1351:243a-2: kun dum brtags pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya
T02D1351:243a-3: chen mo'o // de'i ye shes ni de bsgoms pa
T02D1351:243a-4: las skyes pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po
T02D1351:243a-6: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du yang dbang bcu gcig nyid gsungs te /
T02D1351:243a-8: chu yi dbang gis dang po ste //
T02D1351:243a-9: cod pan dbang bskur gnyis pa'o //
T02D1351:243a-10: gsum pa dar dpyangs dbang gis te //
T02D1351:243a-11: rdo rje dril bus bzhi pa'o //
T02D1351:243a-12: lnga pa rang gi bdag po nyid //
T02D1351:243a-13: ming gi dbang ni drug pa ste //
T02D1351:243a-14: sangs rgyas rjes gnang bdun par 'dod //
T02D1351:243a-15: bum pas dbang bskur brgyad pa yin //
T02D1351:243a-16: dgu pa gsang ba'i dbang gis te //
T02D1351:243a-17: shes rab dbang bskur bcu pa'o //
T02D1351:243a-18: de nyid rdo rje'i rab sbyor gyis //
T02D1351:243a-19: rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kun sbyin zhing //
T02D1351:243a-20: rang nyid ston pas lung ston pa //
T02D1351:243a-21: 'di ni dbang bskur cho ga yin //
T02D1351:243a-22: slob dpon smad par mi bya zhing //
T02D1351:243a-23: bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya //
T02D1351:243a-25: de ltar de nyid rdo rje'i rab sbyor gyis zhes
T02D1351:243a-26: pas gtso bor dbang bcu gcig pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D1351:243a-27: kyis gsal por gsungs pa'i phyir mkhas pa rnams kyis
T02D1351:243a-28: dbang bzhi pa'am bcu gcig pa tha dad pa nyid
T02D1351:243a-30: bum pa la sogs pa bzhi po 'di rnams kyis
T02D1351:243a-31: rjes su 'gro ba dang bcas pa ni grangs bzhin
T02D1351:243a-32: du 'gyur pa dang mi 'gyur ba dang 'dzag pa
T02D1351:243a-33: dang mi 'dzag pa zhes bya ba'i ming rnams so
T02D1351:243a-34: / lus zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1351:243a-35: de bzhin du byis pa dang dar ma dang rgan po dang skye dgu'i bdag po'i ming rnams so //
T02D1351:243a-36: shes rab ces pa lo bcu gnyis ma nas brtsams nas lo nyi shu ma'i bar du ste /
T02D1351:243a-37: dbang bskur ba na rang gi sems dga' ba'i skal
T02D1351:243a-38: ba dang ldan ma de'i nu mar yan lag ni
T02D1351:243a-39: / reg pas byang chub sems 'pho zhes pa gtsug
T02D1351:243a-40: tor gyi padma 'dab pa ma bzhi pa las khu
T02D1351:243a-41: ba bdud rtsi'i rgyun dpral ba'i padma 'dab ma bcu
T02D1351:243a-42: drug gi bar 'ongs pas sku'i dga' ba dang gsung
T02D1351:243a-43: gi dga' ba dang thugs kyi dga' ba dang ye
T02D1351:243a-44: shes kyi dga' ba'i bdag nyid kyi bde ba nyams
T02D1351:243a-45: su myong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D1351:243b-1: rnal 'byor pa'i 'o ma 'dzin bas dbang bskur ba
T02D1351:243b-2: ni dbang dang po thob pa nyid kyi phyir byis
T02D1351:243b-4: de nas de'i gsang bar cung zad rdo rje gsor
T02D1351:243b-5: bas byang chub sems ni 'pho ba zhes pa mgrin
T02D1351:243b-6: pa'i padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa las
T02D1351:243b-7: snying ga'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar sku'i
T02D1351:243b-8: mchog dga' dang gsung gi mchog dga' dang thugs kyi
T02D1351:243b-9: mchog dga' dang ye shes kyi mchog dga'i bdag nyid
T02D1351:243b-10: kyis bde ba nyams su myong bar byed pa gang
T02D1351:243b-11: yin pa de ni rgan po ste /
T02D1351:243b-12: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1351:243b-13: phyag rgya chen po zhes pa nam mkha' las byung
T02D1351:243b-14: pa'i gzugs te de'i rjes chags phyi rol rang gi
T02D1351:243b-15: nyams su sgom pa zhes bya ba las skyes pa
T02D1351:243b-16: g-yo med ces pa rdo rje nor bu las phyi
T02D1351:243b-17: rol du g-yo ba las 'dzag pa 'gog pa /
T02D1351:243b-18: sku'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang gsung gi
T02D1351:243b-19: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang thugs kyi lhan
T02D1351:243b-20: cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang ye shes kyi lhan
T02D1351:243b-21: cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid zla ba bdud
T02D1351:243b-22: rtsi mi 'pho ba'i bde ba gang yin pa de
T02D1351:243b-23: ni shes rab chen po zhes bya ba dbang bskur
T02D1351:243b-24: bzhi pa ste / bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes pa'i gsung gis brjod ba'o //
T02D1351:243b-25: 'di ni sgrib pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1351:243b-26: pa'i ye shes lhag par rtogs pa ste grub pa'i
T02D1351:243b-27: ros zangs la sogs pa'i khams rnams gser gyi ngo
T02D1351:243b-28: bo bzhin du sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i phung po
T02D1351:243b-29: dang khams lnga la sogs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs
T02D1351:243b-30: pa lnga dang lha mo lnga la sogs pa skye
T02D1351:243b-31: dgu'i ngo bos rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1351:243b-33: skyob pa nyid gzigs pa'i lam gsung ba /
T02D1351:243b-34: de la sbyor pa'i phyir skyob pa ste skyob pa
T02D1351:243b-35: ni skyob pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa
T02D1351:243b-36: rnams so // gsung pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur
T02D1351:243b-37: pa'i ye shes kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i lus
T02D1351:243b-38: la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ste /
T02D1351:243b-39: dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa /
T02D1351:243b-40: lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha'
T02D1351:243b-41: dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs
T02D1351:244a-0: 'gyur // sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib @244a * //
T02D1351:244a-1: pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang //
T02D1351:244a-2: skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i
T02D1351:244a-3: skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa
T02D1351:244a-4: ste // sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhing
T02D1351:244a-5: mi g-yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas
T02D1351:244a-7: 'di nyid ni gnyis med mi 'gyur ba de khu
T02D1351:244a-8: ba steng du gsang ba dang lte ba dang mgrin
T02D1351:244a-9: par bgrod pas rim pa ji lta bar rdo rje
T02D1351:244a-10: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ming bzhi thob pa'o //
T02D1351:244a-11: dbral bar son pa ni sngar brjod pa'i rnam par
T02D1351:244a-12: dag pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam ba bzhi
T02D1351:244a-13: zhes bya'o // gtsug tor du son pa ni dus
T02D1351:244a-14: kyi 'khor lo zhes pa'i ming ngo zhes pa sems
T02D1351:244a-17: 'di nyid kyis ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1351:244a-18: zhes pa la sogs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1351:244a-19: dngos grub kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu yan
T02D1351:244a-20: lag drug gi rnal 'byor mdor bstan pa gsungs te
T02D1351:244a-22: rab gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
T02D1351:244a-24: sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal ba //
T02D1351:244a-25: zhes pa'i mthar thug pas yan lag drug gi rnal
T02D1351:244a-26: 'byor gyi yan lag dang po so sor sdud pa
T02D1351:244a-27: zhes bya ba mdor bstan to //
T02D1351:244a-28: bkab dang ma ba ka ba ces pa la sogs
T02D1351:244a-29: pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bsam gtan gyi yan lag
T02D1351:244a-30: go // gzugs brnyan mthong na de na ni //
T02D1351:244a-31: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas srog rtsol gyi yan lag go //
T02D1351:244a-32: srog ni thig ler gzhug par bya //
T02D1351:244a-33: zhes pa 'dis 'dzin pa'i yan lag kyang mdor bstan to //
T02D1351:244a-34: rjes su dran pa la sogs pa yan lag gnyis
T02D1351:244a-35: kyi mdor bstan pa yang de'i don mdor bstan pa'i
T02D1351:244a-36: nus pa las ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya'o
T02D1351:244a-37: // yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor yang bcom ldan
T02D1351:244a-38: 'das kyis 'dus pa phyi mar yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1351:244a-39: pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid mchog gi dngos grub
T02D1351:244a-40: sgrub pa nyid kyis mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par
T02D1351:244a-41: bshad pa dang rab tu rgyas par bshad pa rnams
T02D1351:244a-42: kyis ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin te /
T02D1351:244a-43: mi snang la sogs dngos grub rnams //
T02D1351:244a-44: thun mong pa zhes grags pa ste //
T02D1351:244b-0: sangs rgyas @244b nyid sgrub sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D1351:244b-1: dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin //
T02D1351:244b-2: thabs ni rnam pa bzhi po dag / byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa ste //
T02D1351:244b-3: rnal 'byor rgyud rnams thams cad du //
T02D1351:244b-4: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsngags //
T02D1351:244b-5: bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste //
T02D1351:244b-6: nye bar sgrub ba nges par gsum pa ste //
T02D1351:244b-7: sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o //
T02D1351:244b-8: thun mong mchog gi dbye ba yis //
T02D1351:244b-9: bsnyen pa'ang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur //
T02D1351:244b-10: rdo rje bzhi yis thun mong ba //
T02D1351:244b-11: yan lag drug po rnams kyi mchog / dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
T02D1351:244b-12: gnyis pas sa bon bsdu ba yin //
T02D1351:244b-13: gsum pa gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa ste //
T02D1351:244b-14: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
T02D1351:244b-15: rdo rje bzhi po 'di rnams kyis //
T02D1351:244b-16: thun mong sgrub la bsnyen pa ste //
T02D1351:244b-17: ye shes bdud rtsi kho na yis //
T02D1351:244b-18: bsnyen pa kun nas rtag tu bya //
T02D1351:244b-19: yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1351:244b-20: bsnyen pa byas nas mchog sgrub ste //
T02D1351:244b-21: gzhan du bsgrub pa bya dngos grub mchog /'byung bar 'gyur pa med pa nyid //
T02D1351:244b-22: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02D1351:244b-23: srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1351:244b-24: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1351:244b-25: rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu brjod //
T02D1351:244b-26: dbang po bcu po rnams kyi ni //
T02D1351:244b-27: rang la 'jug gnas thams cad las //
T02D1351:244b-28: 'dod pa phyi phyir sdud pa ni //
T02D1351:244b-29: so sor sdud pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1351:244b-30: 'dod pa lnga rnams sdud pa yis //
T02D1351:244b-31: sangs rgyas lnga dang rab sbyor bas //
T02D1351:244b-32: rtog pa bsam gtan zhes brjod de //
T02D1351:244b-33: bsam gtan rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur //
T02D1351:244b-34: rtog pa dang ni dpyod pa dang //
T02D1351:244b-35: dga' dang de bzhin bde ba nyid //
T02D1351:244b-36: sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang lnga //
T02D1351:244b-37: de rnams bsam gtan sdud pa'o //
T02D1351:244b-38: gsang ba'i rgyud rnams thams cad du //
T02D1351:244b-39: rnam pa sna tshogs yongs grags pa'i //
T02D1351:244b-40: gsang ba gsum 'byung rtog pa ste //
T02D1351:244b-41: de la rab sbyor dpyod pa'o //
T02D1351:244b-42: dga' ba rab gsal gsum pa ste //
T02D1351:244b-43: bde ba bsdus pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1351:244b-44: shes dang shes bya 'byung zad pa'i //
T02D1351:244b-45: rang sems lnga par shes par bya //
T02D1351:244b-46: sangs rgyas thams cad rang bzhin zhi //
T02D1351:244b-47: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu gnas //
T02D1351:244b-48: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02D1351:244b-49: 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can //
T02D1351:245a-0: @245a * // gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni //
T02D1351:245a-1: sna yi rtse mor brtag par bya //
T02D1351:245a-2: rin chen chen po kha dog lnga //
T02D1351:245a-3: srog gi rtsol ba zhes par dran //
T02D1351:245a-4: rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni //
T02D1351:245a-5: srog ni thig ler son pa dgod //
T02D1351:245a-6: 'gags pa rin chen dbang por bcas //
T02D1351:245a-8: 'gog pa rdo rjer bgrod sems la //
T02D1351:245a-10: mtshan ma de ni rnam pa lngar //
T02D1351:245a-11: byang chub rdo rjes bshad pa yin //
T02D1351:245a-12: dang po smig rgyu'i rnam pa ste //
T02D1351:245a-13: gnyis pa du ba'i rnam pa yin //
T02D1351:245a-14: gsum pa mkha' snang rnam pa ste ;
T02D1351:245a-16: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
T02D1351:245a-17: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
T02D1351:245a-18: brtan de rdo rje'i lam nas ni //
T02D1351:245a-19: nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya //
T02D1351:245a-20: gang zhig bsgom bya rjes dran pas //
T02D1351:245a-21: de yi rnam par yang dag spro //
T02D1351:245a-22: rjes su dran pa zhes shes bya //
