T02D1351:258a-17: bar 'dzin par byed pa'i sems dang 'dzin par byed
T02D1351:258a-18: pa'i sems de'i gzung bar bya ba du ba la
T02D1351:258a-19: sogs pa rnam pa bcu po pra phab pa'i me
T02D1351:258a-20: long gi snang ba lta bu gang yin pa de
T02D1351:258a-21: nyid ye shes te gzung bar bya ba'i sems so
T02D1351:258a-23: de ltar me long la mig gi gzugs brnyan rang
T02D1351:258a-24: gi mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa bzhin
T02D1351:258a-25: du shes rab dang ye shes kyang ngo //
T02D1351:258a-27: 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa //
T02D1351:258a-28: zhes pa 'dir 'dzin par byed pa'i sems kyis gzung
T02D1351:258a-29: bar bya ba'i sems de la rab tu zhugs pa
T02D1351:258a-30: phyi rol gyi yul rnams la rab tu mi 'jug
T02D1351:258a-32: yan lag drug las so sor sdud pa dang bsam
T02D1351:258a-33: gtan dang srog rtsol dang 'dzin pa ni zhugs pa
T02D1351:258a-34: zhes brjod de / zhugs pa de la mya ngan
T02D1351:258a-35: las 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes
T02D1351:258a-36: pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste bde ba
T02D1351:258a-37: byis pa dang dar la bab pa dang g-yo ba
T02D1351:258a-38: rnams kyi mchog 'jig rten pa'i dpe las 'das pa
T02D1351:258a-39: 'jig rten gsum gyi spyod pa las grol ba zhes
T02D1351:258a-40: zhes brjod de / pa'i don ta / dgod pa
T02D1351:258a-41: dang blta ba dang reg pa dang 'khyud pa dang
T02D1351:258a-42: lag bcangs dang 'khrig pa dang bral ba las kyi
T02D1351:258a-43: phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu dang
T02D1351:258a-44: bral ba stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad pa
T02D1351:258a-45: rab tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1351:258a-46: sangs rgyas zhal te ye shes zhal 'di slob dpon
T02D1351:258a-47: gang gi snying la gnas pa ni bsgoms te rang
T02D1351:258a-48: gi nyams su myong ba dang /
T02D1351:258a-49: slob ma rnams la bstan pa'i phyir dus thams cad
T02D1351:258a-50: du kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal
T02D1351:258b-0: ldan bla ma ste rdo rje 'dzin @258b pa'o zhes
T02D1351:258b-1: pa'i don to // da ni rnal 'byor nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1351:258b-2: dbu mar srog ni rab zhugs nyi ma dang bcas
T02D1351:258b-3: ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g-yas dang g-yon la
T02D1351:258b-4: bcing // phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang
T02D1351:258b-5: mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag
T02D1351:258b-6: bcing // bslang ba yang // padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am
T02D1351:258b-7: rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba
T02D1351:258b-9: sa bon gtang ba min pa'i gtong ba de ni
T02D1351:258b-10: 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i
T02D1351:258b-11: zhal // 'dir dang por rnal 'byor pas dbu mar srog ni rab tu gzhug par bya ste /
T02D1351:258b-12: gang gis mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur ba aa wa dh'u t'ir ro //
T02D1351:258b-13: 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma zhes pa sangs rgyas
T02D1351:258b-14: kyi sku rdo rje ste zhal gcig tu brjod do
T02D1351:258b-15: // de nas nyi ma dang bcas te g-yas pa'i
T02D1351:258b-16: bgrod pa dang lhan cig tu ri bong can gyi
T02D1351:258b-17: bgrod pa zhes pa g-yon pa'i rtsal bgrod pa'i bgrod
T02D1351:258b-18: pa bcing ba'o zhes pa nges pa ste srog rtsol
T02D1351:258b-19: ni gnyis pa gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1351:258b-20: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems zhes pa gzugs
T02D1351:258b-21: la rjes su chags pa byang chub kyi sems zhu
T02D1351:258b-22: ba dang / mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo
T02D1351:258b-23: rje yang dag bslang ba yang gsum pa thugs rdo
T02D1351:258b-24: ba dang / rje'o // ci ste gzugs kyi sgo
T02D1351:258b-25: nas dga' bar ma gyur na de'i tshe padmar rdo
T02D1351:258b-26: rje'i sgra'am zhes pa dal bu rnams kyis bya'o //
T02D1351:258b-27: ci ste bud med ma rnyed na de'i tshe rang gi lag pa'i padmas gsor bar bya'o //
T02D1351:258b-28: bde ba 'phel ba'i slad du ste lhung ba'i slad du ni ma yin no //
T02D1351:258b-29: de ltar sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba
T02D1351:258b-31: ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal bzhi pa ye shes
T02D1351:258b-32: kyi zhal lo zhes pa rnal 'byor goms pa'i nges
T02D1351:258b-33: pa'o // da ni dkyil 'khor lnga zad pa gsungs pa /
T02D1351:258b-34: sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang
T02D1351:258b-35: 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o
T02D1351:258b-36: // rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges
T02D1351:258b-37: par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan
T02D1351:258b-38: // ma ni // rnam pa thams cad pa ru
T02D1351:258b-39: 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du
T02D1351:258b-41: ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur
T02D1351:258b-42: mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid
T02D1351:259a-1: gang gi tshe khro bo'i lta bas stong pa la
T02D1351:259a-2: sems bkod pa'i rnal 'byor pa mig mi 'dzums par
T02D1351:259a-3: gyur pa de'i tshe g-yon nam g-yas su sa zhes
T02D1351:259a-4: pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1351:259a-5: gang gi tshe g-yas su sa rab tu 'bab pa'i
T02D1351:259a-6: dus su rnal 'byor pa sgom par byed na de'i
T02D1351:259a-8: slar yang g-yon pa'i rtsa la rab tu 'bab pa'i
T02D1351:259a-9: dus su ni ma yin te nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1351:259a-10: la sogs pa'i rim pa las so //
T02D1351:259a-11: des na g-yon dang g-yas su srog gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1351:259a-12: gang 'bab pa de'i chos can nyid kyi phyir dkyil
T02D1351:259a-14: des na g-yas kyi rtsal sa'i dkyil 'khor las srog
T02D1351:259a-15: chu'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug ste de bzhin du ye
T02D1351:259a-16: shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du'o //
T02D1351:259a-17: g-yon gyi rtsa la nam mkha' la sogs pas 'jug go //
T02D1351:259a-18: de bzhin du stong pa nges par du ba la
T02D1351:259a-19: sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur zhing mtshan
T02D1351:259a-20: ma ni rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs su 'gyur
T02D1351:259a-21: ro // gzugs kyang 'gyur ba med pa'i bde bar
T02D1351:259a-22: 'gyur te de nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D1351:259a-23: tu phyin pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1351:259a-24: ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1351:259a-25: dngos grub khams gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur
T02D1351:259a-26: te mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di
T02D1351:259a-27: nyid la'o zhes pa lam la zhugs pa'i nges pa'o
T02D1351:259a-28: // dbang phyi ma phyi ma ni dbang snga ma
T02D1351:259a-29: snga ma la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin la
T02D1351:259a-30: de ni dpal dus kyi 'khor lo dang dri ma
T02D1351:259a-31: med pa'i 'od la sogs pa'i gsung rnams kyis spros
T02D1351:259a-33: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas
T02D1351:259a-34: de kho na rab tu gsal bar bya'o zhes pa
T02D1351:259a-35: yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor ni sngon du 'gro
T02D1351:259a-36: ba 'jig rten pa'i dbang gi yang rgyu can nyid
T02D1351:259a-37: do // yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor yang dpal
T02D1351:259a-38: dus kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i gsung rnams nyid
T02D1351:259a-39: kyis rgya cher rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1351:259a-40: da ni 'di nyid kyis bsgrub pa zhes pa la
T02D1351:259a-41: sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par bshad par brtsam par
T02D1351:259a-42: bya'o // nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i
T02D1351:259a-43: bud shing ma lus pa sreg par byed pa thams
T02D1351:259b-0: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi me 'di @259b nyid
T02D1351:259b-1: kyi ni sgrub pa ste gsal ba'i dngos po rnal
T02D1351:259b-2: 'byor pas du ba la sogs pa rnams kyis bu'o
T02D1351:259b-3: bya'o // // ci ltar gyur pa rnams kyis she na /
T02D1351:259b-4: de rnams kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud dang 'phags pa shes
T02D1351:259b-5: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa
T02D1351:259b-6: nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde thams cad rab tu
T02D1351:259b-8: stong pa la glo bur du rab tu gsal ba'i phyir rab gsal lo //
T02D1351:259b-9: rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02D1351:259b-10: de kho na'i 'bras bu'i snga ltas su gyur ba'i phyir mtshan ma'o //
T02D1351:259b-11: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi blo ni shes rab ste /
T02D1351:259b-12: de'i gzugs brnyan ni rnal 'byor la mngon sum du snang ba'o //
T02D1351:259b-13: phyi nang gi dri ma rjes su chags pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' mnyam pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1351:259b-14: yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i rnam par
T02D1351:259b-15: rtog pa'i mtshan mas mtshon du med pa'i phyir yod
T02D1351:259b-16: dang med las rnam par 'das so //
T02D1351:259b-17: rnal 'byor pas rang rig pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems kyi rkyen gyi don no //
T02D1351:259b-18: rnam pa thams cad du ma byas pa rmad du
T02D1351:259b-19: byung ba rang bzhin med pa'i dngos po'i gzugs nyid
T02D1351:259b-20: kyi phyir / rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams //
T02D1351:259b-21: kun nas yongs su dor ba yis //
T02D1351:259b-23: phyi nang mtha' dag khyab pa dkar po du ba'i rnam pa stong pa'i snang ba ste //
T02D1351:259b-24: 'di yang sprin ltar snang ba'i de ma thag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:259b-26: dang po sprin dang 'dra bar snang //
T02D1351:259b-27: gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o //
T02D1351:259b-29: de bzhin du chu g-yo ba'i rnam pa ni smig rgyu'o //
T02D1351:259b-30: mkha' snang dang sgron me'i rnam pa dag ni rab tu grags so //
T02D1351:259b-31: mtshan ma bzhi po 'di rnams ni bug pa med
T02D1351:259b-32: pa'i khang par mun pa la 'byung ba'i phyir mtshan
T02D1351:259b-33: mo'i rnal 'byor dang nam mkha'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1351:259b-35: dpal 'dus pa la sogs par dang po dang gnyis pa bzlog pas gsungs pa /
T02D1351:259b-36: 'gog par rdo rjer bgrod sems la //
T02D1351:259b-38: dang po smag rgyu'i rnam pa ste //
T02D1351:259b-39: gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o //
T02D1351:259b-40: gsum pa mkha' snang rnam pa ste //
T02D1351:259b-42: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
T02D1351:259b-43: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
T02D1351:260a-1: med pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs par snang ba sngon
T02D1351:260a-2: du 'gro ba me'i rnam pa stong pa'i snang ba
T02D1351:260a-3: ni 'bar ba'o // zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba dag ni rab tu grags so //
T02D1351:260a-4: mun can ni sgra gcan te ri mo nag po ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1351:260a-5: cha dang zhes pa klog gi snang ba'o //
T02D1351:260a-6: thig le che zhes pa rgyu ba dang bcas pa'am
T02D1351:260a-7: mi rgyu ba'i snang ba kha dog sngon po zla
T02D1351:260a-8: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par snang ba'o //
T02D1351:260a-9: mtshan ma drug po 'di rnams ni sprin med pa'i nam mkha' ltar snang ba las 'byung ba'i phyir /
T02D1351:260a-11: bla gab med pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1351:260a-12: de nas de'i dbus su son pa longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1351:260a-13: pa'i sku'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs mthong ba
T02D1351:260a-14: dang lhan cig skad cig gcig la lag par gnas
T02D1351:260a-15: pa'i chu ltar shin tu ngang ba rnam pa thams
T02D1351:260a-16: cad pa'i bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa
T02D1351:260a-17: mthong ba ni sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal ba'o
T02D1351:260a-18: // bkab dang ma bkab mi dag gis //
T02D1351:260a-19: shes par snang la dmigs pa nyid kyis mig phyed
T02D1351:260a-20: btsums pa dag gis stong par te nam mkha' la
T02D1351:260a-21: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba 'di ni
T02D1351:260a-22: rjes su brtags min par rmi lam bzhin du gzugs
T02D1351:260a-23: rnal 'byor bas mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro
T02D1351:260a-24: // gzugs de ni sna tshogs gzugs de bsgom par
T02D1351:260a-25: bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag gis brtan
T02D1351:260a-26: // par bya'o // rgyal ba'i yum par mar gsungs pa /
T02D1351:260a-27: rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1351:260a-28: rin chen sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1351:260a-29: zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1351:260a-30: nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1351:260a-31: rnam pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1351:260a-33: mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang /
T02D1351:260a-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
T02D1351:260a-35: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
T02D1351:260a-37: 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D1351:260a-38: gang rnams kyi blo rten dang bral //
T02D1351:260a-39: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02D1351:260a-40: zab mod dmigs med de rnams kyis //
T02D1351:260a-41: mtshan ma'i don rnams rnam par bsgom //
T02D1351:260a-43: zla ba'i gos can gyi zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D1351:260b-0: snang ba thob pa'i @260b rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1351:260b-1: gzhan du rtags ni shes bya ste //
T02D1351:260b-2: sgrub pa'i 'khrul pa med pa rnams //
T02D1351:260b-3: lam nag gi ni du ba bzhin //
T02D1351:260b-4: mig dang rengs par byed pa dang //
T02D1351:260b-5: mgo bo dud pa nyid dang ni //
T02D1351:260b-6: sems dang sems 'byung nub pa dang //
T02D1351:260b-7: stong nyid mthong ba'i stong pa nyid //
T02D1351:260b-10: gang du dri ma med pa'i mkha' la mig phyed sprul pa na //
T02D1351:260b-11: 'phro ba chen po'i thugs rjes brlan pa'i bsam pa'i rten zab las //
T02D1351:260b-12: yod dang med dang gnyi ga dngos po dngos med 'byed pa bral //
T02D1351:260b-13: stong pa nyid kyi rjes 'gro du ba sogs ni mtha' dag glo bur 'char //
T02D1351:260b-15: dang por thog mtha' las grol ba'i //
T02D1351:260b-16: dbu ma tsam la yang dag gnas //
T02D1351:260b-17: gang zhig der gnas 'dor ba de //
T02D1351:260b-18: 'di yi snang ba bcu bdag nyid //
T02D1351:260b-20: 'dir bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams kyis /
T02D1351:260b-21: bla ma chen po bka' drin las bar snang la khong du chud pa dper brjod pa'o //
T02D1351:260b-22: 'di nyid rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyi rdo
T02D1351:260b-23: rje'i glu kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i tshig gis
T02D1351:260b-25: dpal ldan dpa' bos ra has gsungs pa /
T02D1351:260b-26: rmongs pa nam mkha'i tshad ma ni //
T02D1351:260b-27: gal te shes na rmongs tshogs gcod //
T02D1351:260b-28: dang por rnam dag nam mkha' la //
T02D1351:260b-29: blta zhing blta bas mthong ba 'gag / de bzhin du /
T02D1351:260b-30: mang po smra bas ci zhig bya //
T02D1351:260b-31: chos kyi mtshan ni 'di yis chog / mig byed gyen du blta ba na //
T02D1351:260b-32: mthong ba brten pa nyid kyis shes //
T02D1351:260b-33: rmad byung nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor shar ro bhu su k'u //
T02D1351:260b-34: stong nyid gzugs mdzes ltos shig bhu su k'u //
T02D1351:260b-35: dpe med me tog shar ro bhu su k'u //
T02D1351:260b-36: rin chen rin thang med pa'i me tog long //
T02D1351:260b-37: me tog 'di ni kha dog sna tshogs can //
T02D1351:260b-38: me tog 'di ni stong nyid dgon par skyes //
T02D1351:260b-40: l'a m'a nam mkha'i me tog shar //
T02D1351:260b-41: rab tu mi gnas lci ba'o //
T02D1351:260b-42: blta zhing blta bas nam langs kyang //
T02D1351:260b-43: sh'anti sgron mas lam tshol lo //
T02D1351:260b-45: skya rengs shar ro bhu su k'u //
T02D1351:260b-46: sh'anti sa smras pa nam langs thun //
T02D1351:260b-47: gang tshe zla ba nya ba shar gyur pa //
T02D1351:260b-48: de tshe sems kyi rgyal po rab tu nyal //
T02D1351:260b-49: dga' dang snying rje'i da ma ru yi sgra //
T02D1351:261a-0: @261a * // 'phags pa lha yi dmigs pa med pa gsal //
T02D1351:261a-1: g-yon dang g-yas su khral ba la //
T02D1351:261a-2: kahnas smras pa bar lam mo //
T02D1351:261a-3: sems rtogs rin chen rab dgas grol //
T02D1351:261a-4: grong khyer mis smra rmongs pa rnams //
T02D1351:261a-5: me tog lnga byung de ru thim //
T02D1351:261a-6: dga' ba'i sems nyid nam mkha' byin //
T02D1351:261a-8: rmad du byung ba gang zhig mthun las byung //
T02D1351:261a-9: gang zhig nyi zla bcings shing sgron me sbar //
T02D1351:261a-10: sh'anti rang nyid dpang bzhag rang nyid rgod //
T02D1351:261a-11: nam mkha'i sgrum [?] ma la ni skye ba mthong //
T02D1351:261a-13: zab mo'i chos thos nas ni lam ngan pa //
T02D1351:261a-14: mun pa'i lam la ci yang mthong ba med //
T02D1351:261a-15: gal te nam mkha' rtse mor me tog byung //
T02D1351:261a-16: sh'anti sa smras pa de tshe 'khrul ba zhig / gzhan rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1351:261a-17: bar snang la ni yid dang rlung dang mig / dus gcig tu ni gal te legs sbyar na //
T02D1351:261a-18: rgyal pa'i yon tan rin chen nges par skyes //
T02D1351:261a-19: 'di rnams mtha' dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung //
T02D1351:261a-20: sna tshogs rnam rtog bral zhing mi sems par //
T02D1351:261a-21: gal te bar snang la ni mig gtad na //
T02D1351:261a-22: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni yin nam snyam //
T02D1351:261a-23: rnal 'byor dbang phyug mtha' dag 'di las thob //
T02D1351:261a-25: rang yid mtshan nyid mtha' dag dral ba yis ;
T02D1351:261a-26: / mig phyed gyen du lta ba dang bcas pas //
T02D1351:261a-27: gang cho dbu mar rlung ni bus gyur pa //
T02D1351:261a-28: de tshe rdo rje'i me dang du ba byung //
T02D1351:261a-30: de'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid don du gnyer bas the
T02D1351:261a-31: tshom med par du ba la sogs pa'i lam bsgom
T02D1351:261a-32: par bya'o // phyag rgya chen po yang rtog pas
T02D1351:261a-33: sgro btags pa'i mtshan ma mtha' dag gis mtshon du

T02D1351:262a-0: ste / byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa dman pa rnams kyi bsgom pa'i don du'o zhes pa @262a * //

T02D1351:262a-18: 'tsho ba'i rlung gi rgyu ba 'byung dang 'jug pa'i tshogs rab zhi bar gyur pa na //

T02D1351:262a-23: rtog pa nyams pas blo nyams te //
T02D1351:262a-24: blo ngan rjes su rtogs byed lo //
T02D1351:262a-25: 'di nyid las ni blo bzang la //
T02D1351:262a-26: nam mkha' las lhag ci yang 'byung //
T02D1351:262a-27: sngon med dpyid byung nam mkha'i me tog 'bras //
T02D1351:262a-28: lag pas 'thog reg byar med sa wa ri ;
T02D1351:262a-29: / mig mi 'dzums par blta dang mi bsam dang //
T02D1351:262a-30: rlung 'gog pa ni bla ma dam pa'i gsung //
T02D1351:262a-32: sems kyi dus gsum pa'i sna tshogs gzugs kyang dngos po ma yin te /

T02D1351:262a-34: bo nyid du med pa'i phyir dang rdul phra rab
T02D1351:262a-35: kyi chos nyid las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro

T02D1351:262b-6: gnyis med dngos bo dngos med zad //
T02D1351:262b-7: phra rab rdul gyi chos nyid 'das //
T02D1351:262b-8: stong pa nyid chos rnam par spangs //
T02D1351:262b-9: rtag dang chad las nges par grol //
T02D1351:262b-10: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rigs med pa //

T02D1351:262b-14: g-yang sar rab tu lhung 'gyur blo yang rmongs par rab tu lhung bar 'gyur //
T02D1351:262b-15: gal te 'dir ni gang las dmigs pa'i don med chos rnams rtag rengs par //
T02D1351:262b-16: gyur pa de che lha mo phyag 'tshal bde ba dam pa dpal gyi mthu //

T02D1351:262b-19: ji ltar pra phab pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:262b-20: pra phab pa'i sgras sgrub pa pos ma bsams pa
T02D1351:262b-21: me long la sogs pa rnams la rab tu gsal
T02D1351:262b-22: bar gyur pa'i don brjod de de ni me long
T02D1351:262b-23: la zhes pa me long la dngos med skyes pa'i
T02D1351:262b-24: chom rkun la sogs pa bems po'i chos nyid ma
T02D1351:262b-26: pra dbab pa la 'jug pa'i rgyud du /
T02D1351:262b-34: mig ste brgyad rnams la pra dbab pa 'jug par gsungs so //
T02D1351:262b-36: mkha' la stong pa rnam pa thams cad pa'i //
T02D1351:262b-37: gzugs la de nyid rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1351:262b-38: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i lam thob pas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:262b-39: 'di las pra phab pa las dngos po rab tu
T02D1351:262b-40: gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de dngos med
T02D1351:262b-41: 'gyur te dngos po ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:262b-44: dngos po stong pa'i don mthong phyir //

T02D1351:262b-47: de yang don de'i rab tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D1351:262b-48: 'di mthong ba rnam par rtog pa med par mngon
T02D1351:263a-0: @263a * // sum du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1351:263a-3: mtshan nyid yod pa dper na 'jig rten pa nyid

T02D1351:263b-26: gcan 'bab pa gsum rnams dang bshad ba dang gci

T02D1351:263b-35: rtsa gsum lus dang ngag dang sems rnams so //
T02D1351:263b-36: rigs drug po 'di rnams kyi rtogs pa gsungs pa /

T02D1351:263b-42: steng 'og ces pa la sgra gcan 'bab mkhu ba'i khams kyi thugs so //
T02D1351:263b-43: khu ba 'bab ma rdul gyi khams kyi thugs so //
T02D1351:264a-1: 'o ga rigs drug ces pa la chu dang rlung
T02D1351:264a-2: dang nam mkha' 'bab pa rnams thabs kyi yan lag

T02D1351:264a-4: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcu dang ldan pa'i
T02D1351:264a-5: lo dgu bcu rtsa drug gi nang du 'chi ba

T02D1351:264a-31: srog gi rlung gi lug la sogs pa'i dus sbyor

T02D1351:264a-35: yang dbu ma cung zad 'bab po //

T02D1351:264a-37: zla ba dang nyi ma dag mnyam par 'bab pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o //
T02D1351:264a-39: rkang pa dang bcas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1351:264a-40: dus sbyor gcig 'char ba'i mngon mtshams su 'jug pa
T02D1351:264a-41: dang 'byung bdag gcig tu byas pa la rkang pa
T02D1351:264a-42: dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu rtsa drug 'bab po //

T02D1351:264a-44: kyi mtshams su 'byung ba dang 'jug pa bdun cu
T02D1351:264a-45: rtsa lnga lhag pa'i drug brgya 'bab bo //
T02D1351:264b-0: @264b sems can thams cad kyi lus la dbugs drug
T02D1351:264b-1: brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bdun

T02D1351:264b-4: nyin zhag so sor dbu ma'i dbugs bdun cu rtsa
T02D1351:264b-5: lnga lhag pa'i drug brgya po rnams lo brgya'i nyin
T02D1351:264b-6: zhag stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyis bsgyur
T02D1351:264b-7: te de las nyin zhag gi dbugs drug brgya lhag
T02D1351:264b-8: pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams kyis bgos
T02D1351:264b-9: pas thob pa nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag
T02D1351:264b-10: pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig rnams so //
T02D1351:264b-11: de rnams kyang lo'i nyin zhag drug cu lhag pa'i
T02D1351:264b-12: sum brgya rnams kyis rnam par phye bas phyogs gsum
T02D1351:264b-13: lhag pa'i lo gsum rnams su 'gyur ro //

T02D1351:264b-15: ba dang brkyang ma dang lug dang chu 'bab pa
T02D1351:264b-16: ste de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi rang
T02D1351:264b-17: bzhin no // g-yas pa ni nyi ma dang ser
T02D1351:264b-18: skya dang gzhan zhes pa ro ma dang me 'bab
T02D1351:264b-19: pa ste rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin no
T02D1351:264b-20: bzhin no // // 'og tu dbu ma bshad pa'i
T02D1351:264b-21: rtsa dang sa 'bab pa ste rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1351:264b-23: g-yon pa ni gci ba'i rtsa dang rlung 'bab pa ste don yod brub pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1351:264b-24: steng du dbu ma sgra gcan gyi rtsa dang stong
T02D1351:264b-25: pa 'bab ba ste mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin no
T02D1351:264b-26: // de nyid 'og tu g-yas pa khu ba'i rtsa
T02D1351:264b-27: dang ye shes 'bab pa ste rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1351:264b-28: // rang bzhin no // bshang ba'i rtsa steng du
T02D1351:264b-29: zla ba'i lam dang lhan cig gcig tu 'gyur te
T02D1351:264b-30: bug pa gcig pa'i phyi rol de bzhin du gci
T02D1351:264b-31: ba'i rtsa nyi ma dang gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:264b-32: de bzhin du skye ba la sogs pa'i dus bzhir
T02D1351:264b-33: khu ba la 'bab ma sgra gcan dang gcig tu
T02D1351:264b-34: 'gyur ro // lte ba'i steng du kun 'dar ma
T02D1351:264b-35: gang yin pa de'i ming gnyis te yid bzang ma
T02D1351:264b-37: 'og tu khu ba 'bab ma gang yin pa de'i
T02D1351:264b-38: yang ming gnyis te mkha' 'gro gdong ma dang dung
T02D1351:264b-40: lte ba la sogs pa 'dab ma lnga'i lte ba
T02D1351:264b-41: rnams su aa wa dh'u t'ir son pa'i srog gi
T02D1351:264b-42: nus pa sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga rnams 'bab
T02D1351:264b-44: de la lte ba'i chu skyes la sa'i yon tan
T02D1351:264b-45: lnga ste dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya
T02D1351:264b-46: dang sgra'i mtshan nyid rnams so //
T02D1351:265a-1: ga'i chu skyes la chu'i yon tan bzhi ste gzugs
T02D1351:265a-2: dang ro dang reg bya dang sgra'i mtshan nyid rnams
T02D1351:265a-3: so // mgrin pa'i chu skyes la me'i yon tan
T02D1351:265a-4: gsum ste ro dang reg bya dang sgra'i mtshan nyid
T02D1351:265a-5: so // rnams so // dpral ba'i chu skyes la
T02D1351:265a-6: rlung gi yon tan gnyis te reg bya dang sgra'i
T02D1351:265a-8: gtsug tor gyi chu skyes la stong pa'i yon tan gcig ste sgra tsam mo //
T02D1351:265a-9: 'di rnams bzung nas aa wa dh'u t'i 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:265a-10: sdud pas zhes pa la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1351:265a-11: de 'phags pa lha'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1351:265a-12: sa yi khams ni chu la thim //
T02D1351:265a-13: chu ni me la thim par 'gyur //
T02D1351:265a-14: me ni phra mo'i khams la'o //
T02D1351:265a-15: rlung yang sems la thim par 'gyur //
T02D1351:265a-16: sems ni sems byung la thim 'gyur //
T02D1351:265a-17: sems byung ma rig pa la ste //
T02D1351:265a-19: 'di ni srid pa gsum du 'gag / ces ba ste /
T02D1351:265a-20: rlung phyi rol du 'bab pas khams zad pa'i yang ngo //
T02D1351:265a-21: de ni 'jug pa dag slar yang gtsug tor gyi
T02D1351:265a-22: padma la sogs pa'i rim pas sa la ste lte
T02D1351:265a-23: ba'i padma la 'jug ste ni 'jug par 'gyur ro
T02D1351:265a-24: // skyed pas ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1351:265a-25: 'phags pa lha'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1351:265a-26: 'od gsal las ni stong pa che //
T02D1351:265a-27: stong pa las kyang thabs byung ngo //
T02D1351:265a-28: de las shes rab skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1351:265a-29: de las rlung ni yang dag 'byung //
T02D1351:265a-31: me las chu ni yang dag 'byung //
T02D1351:265a-32: chu las kyang ni sa skyes 'gyur //
T02D1351:265a-35: nang du 'bab pas las kyi khams 'phel ba'i phyir yang ngo //
T02D1351:265a-36: de ltar aa wa dh'u t'ir 'gro ba dang 'ong
T02D1351:265a-37: ba na lte ba nas lte ba'i dbus su yin
T02D1351:265a-38: gyi yongs su lhag par 'gyur ba'i phyir la la
T02D1351:265a-39: n'a dag gi padma'i 'dab ma rnams la 'gro ba
T02D1351:265a-40: dang 'od ba ni ma yin no //
T02D1351:265a-41: 'og tu lte gsang nor bu'i chu skyes la /
T02D1351:265a-42: dung can ma'i lus ngag sems rnams 'bab pa ni
T02D1351:265a-43: snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas yon
T02D1351:265a-44: tan gsum dang gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid sdud
T02D1351:265a-45: pa'i rim pas 'byung ba dang skyed pas 'jug pa'o
T02D1351:265b-0: // dung can ma @265b 'di nyid bud med bde
T02D1351:265b-1: ba las te shin tu dga' ba chags pa'i bde
T02D1351:265b-3: dus rtag tu sde rdul 'byung ba'i dus su de nyid khrag 'bab bo //
T02D1351:265b-4: nub dang shar du zhes pa la sogs pas 'chad
T02D1351:265b-5: par 'gyur ba shes rab dang thabs 'khyud pa'i mdor
T02D1351:265b-6: bstan pa shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:265b-7: steng du srog la g-yas dang g-yon dag ste g-yas
T02D1351:265b-8: dang g-yon pa dang shes rab thabs dang dngos yan
T02D1351:265b-9: lag go // 'og tu thur sel la g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag go //
T02D1351:265b-10: 'og dang steng du rdul dang khu ba 'bab pa dag go //
T02D1351:265b-11: bud med rnams kyi dung can ma nying rdul gyi
T02D1351:265b-12: dus su rdul 'bab pa'i phyir gtum mo zhes brjod
T02D1351:265b-13: de de nyid khu ba 'bab pa'i phyir mkha' 'gro
T02D1351:265b-14: gdong ma'o // steng du bud med rnams kyi aa
T02D1351:265b-15: wa dh'u t'i'i dus su ste rdul gyi dus su
T02D1351:265b-16: rdul 'bab pa'i phyir g-yung mo zhes brjod do //
T02D1351:265b-17: skyes bu'i dus su ste khu ba bgrod pa'i dus su kun 'dar ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1351:265b-18: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i sna bug dag la dkyil 'khor 'char bar gsungs pa /
T02D1351:265b-19: rnam shes la sogs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:265b-20: rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1351:265b-21: sa la sogs pa sdud pa'i rim pas te /
T02D1351:265b-22: sna bug g-yon pa la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas rnam par shes pa dang 'du byed dang /
T02D1351:265b-24: gzugs zhes bya ba'i phung po lnga 'bab po //
T02D1351:265b-25: de bzhin du g-yas pa la sa dang chu dang
T02D1351:265b-26: me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i khams
T02D1351:265b-27: lnga 'bab po // dbus su ste dbu ma'i lam
T02D1351:265b-28: du drug pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D1351:265b-29: pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga las dkyil 'khor so so'i dbugs
T02D1351:265b-30: rkang pa dang bcas pa'i bcu gcig bzung nas dbugs
T02D1351:265b-31: rkang pa dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu tsa drug gi
T02D1351:265b-33: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dbu ma'i rtsa 'di rnam
T02D1351:265b-34: la nyin mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor drug cu 'bab po
T02D1351:265b-35: // de la lte ba'i padma'i 'dab ma'i g-yon gyi
T02D1351:265b-36: 'dab ma drug lug dang 'khrig pa dang seng ge
T02D1351:266a-0: bum pa'i bdag nyid rnams la so sor rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dkyil @266a * //
T02D1351:266a-1: 'khor lnga'i bdag nyid las dkyil 'khor sum cu rnams so //
T02D1351:266a-2: de bzhin du g-yas kyi 'dab ma drug glang dang
T02D1351:266a-3: karka ta dang bu mo dang sdig pa dang chu
T02D1351:266a-4: srin dang nya'i bdag nyid rnams la so sor sa
T02D1351:266a-5: la sogs pa dkyil 'khor lnga'i bdag nyid las dkyil
T02D1351:266a-7: / de la gang gi tshe g-yas su glang la
T02D1351:266a-8: sogs pa'i dus sbyor la rlung 'bab pa de'i tshe
T02D1351:266a-9: rtsa ba ste sna bug gi 'og gi cha la
T02D1351:266a-10: sa'i dkyil 'khor dbyu gu gcig 'bab po //
T02D1351:266a-11: de bzhin du de nyid kyi cha sna rgyud kyi phyogs su chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1351:266a-12: g-yas te g-yas kyi tshal me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1351:266a-13: steng gi cha la rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1351:266a-14: dbus su stong pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1351:266a-15: de ltar sna bug gnyis ka la dkyil 'khor re
T02D1351:266a-16: re zhing dbyu gu nas dbyu gu'i bar du 'bab
T02D1351:266a-17: ste dbyu gu lnga rnams kyi dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab
T02D1351:266a-19: g-yon pa'i sna bug gi ni 'dab ma'i dbus dang
T02D1351:266a-20: zhes pa la sogs pas 'chad par 'gyur te de
T02D1351:266a-21: la ltos nas sna bug dga' la'o zhes gsungs so
T02D1351:266a-22: // chu tshod gcig la dbugs du 'bab ce na /
T02D1351:266a-24: rim pas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1351:266a-25: rim pas ni sa la sogs pa dang nam mkha' la sogs pas so //
T02D1351:266a-26: de la chu tshod gcig la 'jug pa dang 'byung
T02D1351:266a-27: ba dag gcig tu byas pa'i dbugs drug cu dang
T02D1351:266a-29: de ltar dkyil 'khor lnga dus sbyor zhes bya bas
T02D1351:266a-30: bsgyur na dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad du 'gyur te
T02D1351:266a-31: / de rnams kyang sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga'i rang bzhin chu tshod lngar 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:266a-32: de ltar dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad po rnams kyang
T02D1351:266a-33: 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyis bsgyur bas nyin mtshan gyis
T02D1351:266a-34: dbugs drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa
T02D1351:266a-36: de rnams kyang lus la chu tshod drug cur 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:266a-38: chu tshod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:266a-39: rtsa g-yon par dus sbyor 'char ba gsungs pa /
T02D1351:266a-40: 'dab ma'i dbus dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:266a-41: gang gi g-yon pa'i rtsa la lug la sogs pas
T02D1351:266a-42: sna bug gi dbus su stong pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab
T02D1351:266a-43: pa de'i tshe nang du lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1351:266b-0: 'dab ma'i dbus su 'bab @266b po zhes bshad par
T02D1351:266b-1: 'gyur ro // de nas shar zhes pa steng du rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1351:266b-4: gzhan du zhes pa 'og gi cha la sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1351:266b-5: rim pas zhes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rim pas so ;
T02D1351:266b-6: / g-yon par zhes pa la sogs pas sngar brjod pa nyid gsal bar byed de /
T02D1351:266b-7: phung po'i rten ni 'byung ba zhes pa'i gsung las
T02D1351:266b-8: brten pa'i bdag nyid rnam par shes pa la sogs
T02D1351:266b-9: pa'i phung bo rnams dang lhan cig rten nam mkha'
T02D1351:266b-10: dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i khams rnams
T02D1351:266b-12: g-yon par zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:266b-13: gzhan las so zhes pa snga ma bzhin rtsa ba
T02D1351:266b-14: nas brtsams te zhes pa'i don te sna bug g-yon
T02D1351:266b-16: g-yon pa rnam par shes pa la sogs pa las
T02D1351:266b-17: 'byung ba zhes pa bskyed pa'i rnam par gnas te
T02D1351:266b-18: / zla ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:266b-19: g-yas par sa la sogs pa'i sdud pa ste /
T02D1351:266b-20: nyi ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:266b-21: g-yon par zla ba gnas pa gang yin pa de
T02D1351:266b-22: shes rab dang bcas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D1351:266b-23: pa'i rang bzhin rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1351:266b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang g-yas par yang thabs
T02D1351:266b-25: dang bcas pa'i spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1351:266b-26: sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste
T02D1351:266b-27: sngags dang lha'i bdag nyid spro ba dang sdud pa'i
T02D1351:266b-28: gzugs can lhan cig skyes pa sems can la gnas
T02D1351:266b-29: pa'o // shes rab ces pa la sogs pas shes
T02D1351:266b-30: rab dang thabs nyid mdor bstan pa de'i rgyas par
T02D1351:266b-31: bshad pa nub dang zhes pa la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D1351:266b-32: 'khor sna bug so sor nub dang ste nub tu
T02D1351:266b-33: sa'i rang bzhin spyan ma dang rnam par snad mdzad
T02D1351:266b-34: pa'o // dag go // shar du rlung gi rang
T02D1351:266b-35: bzhin sgrol ma dang don yod grub pa dag go
T02D1351:266b-36: pa'o // dag go // // de la rnam par
T02D1351:266b-37: snang mdzad kyi shes rab sgrol ma dang don yod
T02D1351:266b-38: grub pa'i spyan ma'o zhes pa phan tshun zhal phyogs
T02D1351:266b-40: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa'i thabs dang
T02D1351:266b-41: bral zhing bsdus pa'i rgyud nyan pa ma rnyed pa
T02D1351:266b-42: rnams la yang dag pa'i rkyen gyis don gsal por
T02D1351:267a-2: mthe bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:267a-3: gang gi phyir lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung la
T02D1351:267a-4: sogs pa'i sor mo lnga nam mkha' la sogs pa'i
T02D1351:267a-5: rang bzhin rnams kyi dbus su mthe bo dang ming
T02D1351:267a-6: med sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin dag 'khyud pa
T02D1351:267a-7: lha mnyes pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1351:267a-8: don du slob ma'i kha dang lha mnyes pa la
T02D1351:267a-9: ston pa de'i phyir sa dang rlung dag phan tshun
T02D1351:267a-10: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por shes rab dang
T02D1351:267a-12: 'di ltar gzhan gyi rigs la 'khyud pas bya ba
T02D1351:267a-13: 'grub kyi rang gi rigs la 'khyud pas ma yin
T02D1351:267a-14: te / rang gi bdag nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:267a-15: sa'i khams las byung ba'i lus kyi dbang po rlung
T02D1351:267a-16: gi khams las byung ba'i yul reg bya 'dzin par
T02D1351:267a-17: byed de / de nas bshang ba dang gci ba'i rtsa dag shes rab dang thabs su brjod do //
T02D1351:267a-18: g-yas su me'i rang bzhin gos dkar mo dang rin chen 'byung ldan dag go //
T02D1351:267a-19: g-yon du chu'i rang bzhin m'a ma k'i dang 'od dpag med dag go //
T02D1351:267a-20: de'i phyir 'od dpag med kyi shes rab gos dkar
T02D1351:267a-21: mo dang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi m'a ma k'i'o
T02D1351:267a-22: // gang gi phyir lag pa g-yas ba'i gung mo
T02D1351:267a-23: mdzub mo me dang chu'i rang bzhin dag 'khyud par
T02D1351:267a-24: ral gri'i phyag rgya ston cing me'i khams las skyes
T02D1351:267a-25: pa'i yul ro chu'i khams las byung ba'i ro 'dzin
T02D1351:267a-26: dbang po 'dzin par byed pa de'i phyir me dang
T02D1351:267a-27: chu dag shes rab dang thabs nyid du grub po
T02D1351:267a-28: // // des na la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag shes rab dang thabs nyid do //
T02D1351:267a-29: dbu mar steng gi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa
T02D1351:267a-30: stong pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa 'og gi phyogs
T02D1351:267a-31: su rnam par gnas pa mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes
T02D1351:267a-32: kyi bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D1351:267a-34: phan tshun zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i steng 'og
T02D1351:267a-35: tu gnas pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
T02D1351:267a-36: dang rdo rje sems dpa' dag 'khyud pa yang snga
T02D1351:267a-37: ma la ltos nas shes par bya'o //
T02D1351:267a-38: gang gi phyir lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur la
T02D1351:267a-39: mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par byas pa'i
T02D1351:267a-40: mi bskyod pa'i mche ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa
T02D1351:267a-41: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i
T02D1351:267b-0: gri gug gi phyag rgya yin pa de'i phyir @267b
T02D1351:267b-1: stong pa dang ye shes dang shes rab dang thabs
T02D1351:267b-2: nyid do // de nas aa wa dh'u t'i dang
T02D1351:267b-3: dung can ma dag shes rab dang thabs nyid do
T02D1351:267b-4: nyid do // // de ma thag tu 'chad par
T02D1351:267b-5: 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad par rigs drug pa 'khyud
T02D1351:267b-6: pa'i shes rab byed pa gsungs te /
T02D1351:267b-7: gang gi phyir g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i lag mthil
T02D1351:267b-8: yang dag par sbyar ba spyi bor byas pa na
T02D1351:267b-9: stong pa la sogs pa'o rang bzhin sor mi rnams
T02D1351:267b-10: phan tshun sbyor ba dkyil 'khor bcu sbyor ba byas
T02D1351:267b-11: pa gang gi tshe rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje
T02D1351:267b-12: rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya yin la /
T02D1351:267b-13: de nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i chu
T02D1351:267b-14: gri'i rnam pa gri gug gi phyag rgya yin te
T02D1351:267b-15: / de'i phyir 'di dag shes rab dang thabs nyid do //
T02D1351:267b-16: 'dis 'di yang nye bar mtshon par byed de dbu
T02D1351:267b-17: ma 'bab pa'i sbyor bas byang chub kyi sems zhu
T02D1351:267b-18: ba 'pho ba med ba'i bde bas rdo rje'i rtse
T02D1351:267b-20: de nyid gri gug ste mi shes pa gcod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1351:267b-21: phyi rol du rigs drug pa gri gug dang bcas
T02D1351:267b-22: pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i bdag nyid gang yin
T02D1351:267b-23: pa de yang nang du mnyam pa ste nyi ma
T02D1351:267b-24: dang zla ba mnyam par 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:267b-25: dbu ma'i rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i la 'bab pa'i
T02D1351:267b-26: mnyam pa yang skye ba'i dus su 'bab pa las
T02D1351:267b-27: skyed pa'i rgyu'o // 'chi ba'i dus su 'bab pa las sdud pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1351:267b-28: yang de kho na sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1351:267b-29: kyis phyi rol du 'bab pa 'gags pa 'jig rten
T02D1351:267b-30: las 'das pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid
T02D1351:267b-32: 'khor ba pa rnams kyis ma 'gags pa phung po
T02D1351:267b-33: la sogs pa nyams par byed pa nyid kyis bsdus
T02D1351:267b-34: pa'i rgyu'o // de yang mnyam pa sngar brjod pa'i
T02D1351:267b-35: sna bug g-yon par 'bab pa'i phung po lnga rnams
T02D1351:267b-36: pa'i rgyu'o // dang / sna bug g-yas par 'bab pa'i khams lnga rnams dang /
T02D1351:267b-37: lte ba dang gsang ba dang nor bu'i padmar gnas
T02D1351:267b-38: pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams kyi
T02D1351:267b-39: yang gcig nyid kho na dbu ma'i rtsar son pa
T02D1351:267b-40: ni yin gyi / gzhan ni ma yin no zhes
T02D1351:267b-41: pa rlung 'bab pa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i zol gyis
T02D1351:267b-42: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha thams cad dang ye
T02D1351:267b-43: shes kyi rnam par gzhag pa brjod pa'o //
T02D1351:267b-44: zla ba nyi ma'i zhes pa la sogs pa la
T02D1351:267b-45: gang gi tshe steng du zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D1351:268a-1: gcan gyi rtsa rnams 'gags pa de'i tshe 'og tu
T02D1351:268a-2: bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba'i rtsa rnams
T02D1351:268a-3: 'gag go // de bzhin du steng du gsum po
T02D1351:268a-4: rnams grol nas 'og tu gsum po rnams grol lo
T02D1351:268a-5: 'gag go // // rtsa drug po de rnams kyang
T02D1351:268a-6: snga ma bzhin skyed pa dang sdud pa'i byed pa
T02D1351:268a-7: 'gag go // // can no // 'chi ltas kyi mchan nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1351:268a-9: lug la po gas pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor
T02D1351:268a-10: la skyes ba che thung ba rnams kyi lus la
T02D1351:268a-11: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan mi mnyam ste
T02D1351:268a-12: / mi mnyam pas srog ces bya ba'i rlung dbyu
T02D1351:268a-13: gu lnga 'bab pa'i rim pa las 'das nas g-yon
T02D1351:268a-17: mtshan mo gcig ces pa ste /
T02D1351:268a-18: gang gi tshe mtshan mo gcig nyin mtshan du 'bab pa de'i 'chi ltas rtsom pa ste /
T02D1351:268a-19: 'chi ltas de las lo gsum gyis 'chi bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1351:268a-20: de bzhin du glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus
T02D1351:268a-21: sbyor las skyes pa rnams kyi g-yas pa'i rtsang nyin
T02D1351:268a-22: mtshan lnga 'bab pa las lo gsum gyis 'chi bar
T02D1351:268a-23: shes par bya'o zhes pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1351:268a-24: re zhig nyi ma'i 'chi ltas rgyas bar bshad pa /
T02D1351:268a-25: g-yas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:268a-26: lte ba'i padma'i snying por yongs su bskor ba la
T02D1351:268a-27: khyim gyi bdag nyid 'dab ma bcu gnyis kyi sngon
T02D1351:268a-28: gyi 'dab ma la nyin mtshan lngar srog 'bab po
T02D1351:268a-29: // de nas g-yas skor gyi 'dab ma gnyis ba'i phyogs zhes pa bcu'o //
T02D1351:268a-30: gsum pa la tshes zhes pa bco lnga'o //
T02D1351:268a-32: lnga pa la de nyid ces pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D1351:268a-33: drug pa la gcig lhag rim pas te nyi shu rtsa drug go //
T02D1351:268a-34: bdun pa la slar yang gcig lhag rim pas nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du srog 'bab po //
T02D1351:268a-35: gang gi phyir 'dir nyi mas zla ba'i yon tan
T02D1351:268a-36: sgra dang reg bya dang ro dang gzugs dang dri
T02D1351:268a-37: rnams bzung nas 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag rnams bstan
T02D1351:268a-38: te / des na khyim lnga'i bar du lnga pa lngas 'phel lo //
T02D1351:268a-39: de nas khyim drug pa dang bdun pa la gcig lhag pas rim pas 'phel lo //
T02D1351:268a-40: khyim bdun pa la rdzogs pa'i dus te khu ba'i
T02D1351:268a-41: khams la 'chi ltas kyi rlung rab tu zhugs pa'i
T02D1351:268b-0: @268b phyir gang du 'ga' zhig gis kyang srog ldog
T02D1351:268b-2: rdzogs pa'i dus de nas khu ba'i khams zad pa'i
T02D1351:268b-3: don du brgyan pa la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams

T02D1351:268b-5: // de la brgyad pa la bco lnga'o //
T02D1351:268b-8: bcu gcig pa la gsum mo zhes pa nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum rnams so //
T02D1351:268b-9: bcu gnyis pa la ni stong pa ste slar yang

T02D1351:268b-38: de nas dbugs ni zad byas nas //

T02D1351:268b-43: rnam shes sreg dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1351:268b-44: shi nas slar yang srid par 'gro //
T02D1351:268b-45: des na pha rol med mi 'gyur //
T02D1351:268b-46: dper na mkhan po las rig pa //

T02D1351:268b-48: bzhin las me long la bzhin dang //
T02D1351:268b-49: rgya las rgya gzhan ji lta bar //
T02D1351:268b-50: zhes ma 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag rgyu ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1351:269a-1: bdag nyid 'tsho ba'i dus kyi rim pa gsum gsungs pa /

T02D1351:269a-4: ni sngon gyi 'dab ma la gsum mo //

T02D1351:269a-14: bcu gcig pa la gsum mo //

T02D1351:269b-16: brgyad pa stong par byas nas lhag ma nyin zhag

T02D1351:271a-17: nyin zhag bzhi g-yas pa la'o //

T02D1351:271a-20: gsum ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1351:271a-22: drug ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1351:271a-24: lnga ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1351:271a-25: de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gnyis g-yas la'o //
T02D1351:271a-26: sum cu rtsa gnyis ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1351:271a-27: sum cu rtsa gsum g-yon pa la'o ;
T02D1351:271a-28: / sum cu rtsa gsum ji lta ba bzhin du'o zhes pa'i par du'o //
T02D1351:271a-29: 'dir g-yas pa la gnyis la sogs pa sum cu'i
T02D1351:271a-30: mthar thug pa mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gsum gsum gyi
T02D1351:271a-31: rim pas sa la sogs pa'i khams zad do //
T02D1351:271a-32: g-yon pa la gcig la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa
T02D1351:271a-33: dgu'i mthar thug pa mi mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gsum
T02D1351:271a-34: gsum gyi rim pas nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams
T02D1351:271a-35: zad do // de la nyin zhag gsum cu rtsa gcig gis snying stobs kyi khams zad do //
T02D1351:271a-36: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rdul gyi khams zad do //
T02D1351:271a-37: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis mun pa'i khams zad do //
T02D1351:271a-38: mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes pa rnams kyi
T02D1351:271a-39: ni gcig la sogs pa'i rim pas 'di 'bab po
T02D1351:271a-41: de ltar nyin zhag gsum gyis dman pa'i lo brgya
T02D1351:271a-42: ste de'i steng du nyin zhag gsum cu rtsa bzhi
T02D1351:271a-43: rgyu'o // de la nyin zhag gcig g-yas pa la'o //
T02D1351:271b-0: @271b nyin zhag gcig g-yon pa la'o //
T02D1351:271b-1: de lta bzhin du rim pas nyin zhag sum cu
T02D1351:271b-2: rtsa gsum gyi bar du 'bab ste de las rim
T02D1351:271b-3: pa khams dang phung po dang yul dang dbang po
T02D1351:271b-4: dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba dang /
T02D1351:271b-5: las kyi dbang po lnga rnams zad do //
T02D1351:271b-6: de nas dbu ma la nyin zhag gcig ste de
T02D1351:271b-7: las khams dang phung po la sogs pa drug pa
T02D1351:271b-8: rnams bskams nas srid pa gzhan du 'gro'o //
T02D1351:271b-9: de ltar rnal 'byor pas 'chi ltas kyi mtshan nyid shes nas de slu ba'i thabs gsungs pa /
T02D1351:271b-10: 'chi ltas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:271b-11: de la nyi ma'i 'chi ltas su gyur na rdo
T02D1351:271b-12: rje skyil krung bcings nas srog rtsol sngon du 'gro
T02D1351:271b-13: bas dpung pa g-yas pa nu ma g-yas pa btsir
T02D1351:271b-14: ba las dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pa'i bdag nyid g-yas
T02D1351:271b-15: pa las bkug ste g-yon pa la srog yang dag
T02D1351:271b-17: des nyi ma'i 'chi ltas ldog go //
T02D1351:271b-18: de bzhin du g-yon pa las g-yas pa la zla ba'i 'chi ltas ldog go //
T02D1351:271b-19: de bzhin du skyil krung byas nas thig ler te
T02D1351:271b-20: dpral bar gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma bcu drug dkar
T02D1351:271b-21: po'i dbus su srog rtsol sngon du 'gro bas sems
T02D1351:271b-22: gzhug par bya'o // srog ni thig ler gzhug par bya //
T02D1351:271b-23: zhes pa gtso bor 'dzin ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1351:271b-24: 'di ni bsnyen pa'i yang gtso bo ste 'chi ltas slu ba'i thabs so //
T02D1351:271b-25: aa wa dh'u t'i'i zhes pa la sogs pa'i gzhung yang de'i dgongs pa nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1351:271b-26: de bzhin du skyil krung bcings nas aa wa dh'u
T02D1351:271b-27: di'i zhabs ni lte ba'i padma drug cu rtsa bzhi
T02D1351:271b-28: pa ser bo ste de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1351:271b-29: 'khor la aam yig dkar po'i steng du re kha'i
T02D1351:271b-30: rnam pa de dang rab tu sbyor ba bsgom par
T02D1351:271b-31: bya'o // de bzhin du rtag tu rdo rje bslang
T02D1351:271b-32: bar bya rang gi lag pa'i mtsho skyes la sogs
T02D1351:271b-33: pas ji ltar thig le phyi rol du mi 'byung
T02D1351:271b-34: bar te 'chi ltas kyi rgyu zla nyi'i bgrod pa
T02D1351:271b-37: gzhan du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:271b-38: steng gi 'chi ltas slu ba brjod nas /
T02D1351:271b-40: 'og tu'ang dung can mar thur sel zhes pa ste
T02D1351:271b-41: 'og tu yang dung can ma'i rtsa 'ba' zhig la
T02D1351:272a-1: ba dang gci ba 'bab pa dag thur sel zhes bya ba'i rlung 'bab na zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1351:272a-2: rgyun du bshad pa dang gci ba 'bab pa nyid kyis de ma zhugs pa las kyang 'chi ba'o //
T02D1351:272a-3: de la 'chi ltas slu ba'i thabs kyi zol gyis
T02D1351:272a-4: dga' ba rnams 'chi ltas zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1351:272a-5: mdor bstan te / mgo bo'i zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1351:272a-6: gtsug tor gyi padma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i dbus las
T02D1351:272a-7: dpral ba'i chu skyes 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i dbus
T02D1351:272a-8: su khu ba dga' ba dang bzang po dang rgyal
T02D1351:272a-9: ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa zhes bya ba
T02D1351:272a-10: cha lngas 'ongs pa gnyis ka la khyab pa ni
T02D1351:272a-12: de nas mgrin pa snying gar mchog dga' zhes pa
T02D1351:272a-13: mgrin pa'i chu skyes 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1351:272a-14: pa las snying ga'i padma 'dab ma brgyad par snga
T02D1351:272a-15: ma bzhin khyab pa mchog dga'o //
T02D1351:272a-16: dga' bral dga' ba de nas 'gyur //
T02D1351:272a-17: zhes pa lte ba'i padma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa
T02D1351:272a-18: bzhi pa las gsang ba'i chu skyes 'dab ma sum
T02D1351:272a-19: cu rtsa gnyis par khyab pa dga' bral dga' ba'o
T02D1351:272a-20: // de yang sna tshogs dga' ba dam por 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1351:272a-21: sh'ati yig dang mgrin pa'i k'u dza na la sogs
T02D1351:272a-22: pa lte ba dang gsang bar yang phyi rol rtogs
T02D1351:272a-23: pa kha phyir phyogs pa'i bde ba zos pa ste
T02D1351:272a-24: bdag gis zhes rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid rang rig pa
T02D1351:272a-25: tsam dga' ba'i mthar thug pa skye ba yin gyi
T02D1351:272a-26: dga' ba dang bral ba'i bde ba ni ma yin
T02D1351:272a-27: no // de nas gsang ba'i padma nas rdo rje
T02D1351:272a-28: nor bu'i nang du gnas pa'i chu skyes 'dab ma
T02D1351:272a-29: brgyad pa'i bar du mi g-yo ba'i cha bcu drug
T02D1351:272a-30: pa 'ongs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba
T02D1351:272a-31: no // ste / 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi phyi rol du bgrod pa med pa'i phyir mi 'pho ba'o //
T02D1351:272a-32: 'dod chags bral las te chags pa'i dga' ba dang
T02D1351:272a-33: bral ba las gtsug tor du gnas pa'i bde ba
T02D1351:272a-34: ste khu ba gang yin pa de rab tu gnas
T02D1351:272a-35: pa'o // rdo rje nor bu las 'pho ba med
T02D1351:272a-36: pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das
T02D1351:272a-37: pa'o // pa'o // bde ba'i rgyal po 'di ni
T02D1351:272a-38: gtsug tor dang rdo rje nor bu'i bar du khyab
T02D1351:272a-39: pa'i phyir rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa
T02D1351:272a-40: pa'o // pa'o // yin no // de nyid kyi phyir chags chen dang mi 'gyur ba yang ste /
T02D1351:272a-41: gtso bo yin pa'i phyir khyab bdag 'jig rten gsum
T02D1351:272b-0: gyi dbang phyug @272b ste thams cad de'i gnas 'dod
T02D1351:272b-1: pa dang mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1351:272b-2: // bdud rtsi yin pa nyid kyi phyir khu ba
T02D1351:272b-3: nyid zla ba ste khu ba zla ba de'i gtsug
T02D1351:272b-4: tor du 'char ba ni dkar po'i tshes gcig ste
T02D1351:272b-5: gsang bar rdzogs pa gsum pa ji srid par ro
T02D1351:272b-6: // // 'dir byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba
T02D1351:272b-7: la sogs pa'i dbye bas rdzogs pa gsum du 'gyur
T02D1351:272b-8: te gsang bar dga' bral dga' ba las ni /
T02D1351:272b-9: bcu drug cha gang de nor bu'i //
T02D1351:272b-10: padma rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas //
T02D1351:272b-11: rdo rje'i rtse mo'i mthar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:272b-12: de las steng du nag po'i tshes gcig 'ongs pa
T02D1351:272b-13: na ste chags bral rab tu zhugs pa'i dus su
T02D1351:272b-14: 'gyur te 'pho ba'i dus nyid nag po'i tshe gcig
T02D1351:272b-16: de ni 'dod chags nyams pa'i phyir nag po'i phyogs
T02D1351:272b-17: te rdul gyi gzugs kyis nyi ma'i cha dang po
T02D1351:272b-19: de nas 'dod chags bral bas nyi ma mdzod spu'i
T02D1351:272b-20: gnas dpral bar 'gro ste gnam stong ngo zhes pa'i
T02D1351:272b-22: nyi ma'i cha shas bcu drug ma //
T02D1351:272b-24: de nyid zla ba nyams pa zhes pa brjod de
T02D1351:272b-25: nyi mas rdul gyi gzugs kyis bkab pa nyid kyi
T02D1351:272b-26: phyir ro // chags pa'i bde ba la chags bral phyir yang de nyid do //
T02D1351:272b-27: lus can thams cad de lha dang lha ma yin
T02D1351:272b-28: dang mi la sogs pa rnams 'chi ba na ste
T02D1351:272b-29: 'chi ba'i dus su zla ba bdud rtsi 'og tu
T02D1351:272b-30: 'gro zhes pa zla ba bdud rtsi byang chub kyis
T02D1351:272b-31: sems 'pho ba'i chags pa goms pa las brjod pa'i
T02D1351:272b-32: rim pas 'og tu khu ba'i lam nas 'gro'o //
T02D1351:272b-33: de bzhin du nyi ma rdul steng du 'gro'o //
T02D1351:272b-34: sgra gcan mi shes pa ma rig pa'i bag chags
T02D1351:272b-35: dang lhan cig stobs dang ldan pa'i srog dang bcas
T02D1351:272b-36: pa'i rnam shes 'di dngos po'i mtshan nyid la ste
T02D1351:272b-37: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi sprul pa'i
T02D1351:272b-39: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir
T02D1351:272b-40: zla ba bdud rtsi khu ba'i khams ni brjod pa'i
T02D1351:272b-41: lam bsgoms pas steng du ste gyen du bgrod pa
T02D1351:272b-42: dang / 'og tu yang nyi ma rdul bgrod pa dang /
T02D1351:272b-43: sgra gcan gyi mtshan nyid rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la bgrod par bya'o //
T02D1351:272b-44: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sngon 'di mdzad do zhes
T02D1351:272b-45: pa la sogs pa ston pa sangs rgyas zhes pa
T02D1351:273a-1: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni zla ba bdud rtsi nya
T02D1351:273a-2: ste cha bco lnga yongs su rdzogs pa nyid mdzod
T02D1351:273a-3: spu'i padmar te dbral bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:273a-4: nyi rdul gnam stong gsang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:273a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi de dag ste zla ba dang
T02D1351:273a-6: nyi ma cha bcu drug pa dag rim pa ji
T02D1351:273a-7: lta bas gtsug tor dang rdo rje nor bu'o //
T02D1351:273a-8: de mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa /
T02D1351:273a-9: rkang pa gcig gis mthil gnon pa //
T02D1351:273a-10: sa yi snying po mthil gnas pa //
T02D1351:273a-11: tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo gnon //
T02D1351:273a-12: rkang mtheb sen mo la gnas pa //
T02D1351:273a-14: brjod pa ni rdo rje'i tshig ste bgrod par bya ba dang rtogs par bya ba'o //
T02D1351:273a-15: gang gis tshig mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de'i zhabs
T02D1351:273a-16: la tshig gi sgrub byed spyi bos rtag tu phyag
T02D1351:273a-17: 'tshal ba'o zhes pa mi phyed pa'i ye shes ni
T02D1351:273a-18: ston pa'o // lus can kun gyi zhes pa 'khor
T02D1351:273a-19: ba pa thams cad kyi phyin ci log la rab
T02D1351:273a-20: tu gnas pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1351:273a-22: rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa mi na //
T02D1351:273a-23: zhes bya ba bde ba chen po'i ming can lus
T02D1351:273a-24: dag pa las sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams phyin
T02D1351:273a-25: ci log sgrib pa 'bad pa nyid du 'gyur ro
T02D1351:273a-26: // khams gzhan de rnams dbyer med pa 'dzin pa'i
T02D1351:273a-27: stobs kyis rang nyams su rab tu 'jug pa'i gtum
T02D1351:273a-28: mo 'bar ba las dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye
T02D1351:273a-29: bas spyi bo las babs pa'i lus dang ngag dang
T02D1351:273a-30: sems ye shes kyi thig le rnams brjod pa'i rims
T02D1351:273a-31: pas phyi rol du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir mi
T02D1351:273a-32: 'gyur ba'i bde ba rdzogs pa rnams kyi sku bzhi'i
T02D1351:273a-33: rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
T02D1351:273a-34: nor bur zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:273a-35: bde chen las zhes pa bde ba chen po'i ming
T02D1351:273a-36: can dag pa'i sku las te phyin ci log gis
T02D1351:273a-37: sku'i thig le gang yin pa de bzhin pa'i gnas
T02D1351:273a-39: de yang rdo rje rtse mor gnas so //
T02D1351:273a-40: de las nor bur thugs shin tu gnyid log zad par las so //
T02D1351:273a-41: gsang bar rmi lam zad par las so //
T02D1351:273a-42: lte bar sku sad pa'i gnas skabs zad pa las so //
T02D1351:273a-43: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku 'di rnams kyang dag pa'i sku las spro ba'o //
T02D1351:273a-44: thabs kyi 'og tu zhes pa rdo rje nor bu'i
T02D1351:273b-0: rtse mo las chos kyi sku la sogs pa @273b
T02D1351:273b-1: 'di rnams kyi spro ba gang yin pa de thabs
T02D1351:273b-2: kyi cha'i rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D1351:273b-3: shes rab kyi ni slar yang steng du 'gyur te /
T02D1351:273b-5: shes rab 'di'i sprul pa zhes bya ba sku rdo
T02D1351:273b-6: rje dpral bar te snga ma bzhin du phyin ci
T02D1351:273b-7: log gis so // de bzhin du /
T02D1351:273b-8: mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dab skyes la //
T02D1351:273b-9: rim pa ji lta bas gsung thugs ye shes rdo
T02D1351:273b-10: rje rnams ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos dang
T02D1351:273b-11: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku rnams te shes rab kyi
T02D1351:273b-13: de bzhin du shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1351:273b-14: de rdo rje sems dpa'i sku las phung po la
T02D1351:273b-15: sogs pa rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D1351:273b-16: gzugs nyid kyi sems can gyi ched du spro ba'o
T02D1351:273b-17: // 'dis ni don gyis rjes su dran pa'i yan lag mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1351:273b-18: 'bras bu mdor bstan nas de sgrub thabs gsungs pa /
T02D1351:273b-19: las kyi phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:273b-20: las kyi phyag ni nu ma dang skrar ldan pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi bde ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D1351:273b-21: las ni tsumba na dang 'khyud pa dang gsang bar
T02D1351:273b-22: reg pa dang rdo rje bskyod pa la sogs pa
T02D1351:273b-23: bya ba'i bdag nyid can te /
T02D1351:273b-24: des nye bar mtshon pa'i phyag rgya ni yid ches
T02D1351:273b-25: pa byed pa mo yin la yid ches pa ni
T02D1351:273b-26: 'dir 'gyur ba'i bde ba mtshon par byed pa ste
T02D1351:273b-27: / mu dam bde ba'i khyad par r'a ste ster ba'o zhes pa phyag rgya'o //
T02D1351:273b-28: ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni rang gi sems kyis
T02D1351:273b-29: yongs su brtags pa sna tshogs yum la tshogs pa
T02D1351:273b-30: lha mo'i rang bzhin rjes su longs spyod pa ji
T02D1351:273b-31: srid par te gzugs kyi khams kyi bde ba'i rgyu'o
T02D1351:273b-32: // ye shes ni sngon dgong pa dang blta ba la sogs pa bsgoms pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1351:273b-33: yid ches pa ni 'dir g-yo ba'i bde ba mtshan par byed pa'o //
T02D1351:273b-34: chen po yang 'di yin la phyag rgya yang yin pas phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1351:273b-35: slar yang 'di'i chen po nyid ni rnam pa thams
T02D1351:273b-36: cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyi tshe ba ma
T02D1351:273b-37: yin pa nyid yin la byang chub kyi sems rdo
T02D1351:273b-38: rje 'dis rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir phyag rgya ste /
T02D1351:273b-39: yid ches pa ni 'dir rang gi sems kyis yongs
T02D1351:273b-40: su brtags pa'i chos dang bral ba du ba la
T02D1351:273b-41: sogs pa'i mtshan ma sngon du 'gro ba'i rang gi
T02D1351:273b-42: sems rab tu gsal ba rnal 'byor bas rtogs par
T02D1351:273b-43: bya ba pra phab pa lta bu'o //
T02D1351:274a-1: bo phyag rgya chen po ni mu dam mchog tu
T02D1351:274a-2: mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid
T02D1351:274a-3: de r'a ti gang ba'i gnas skabs mi g-yo ba'i
T02D1351:274a-4: sbyor bas dus thams cad kun nas ster ba'o zhes
T02D1351:274a-5: pa phyag rgya'o // 'di'i chen po nyid kyang spangs
T02D1351:274a-6: pa chen po nyid dang rtogs pa chen po nyid
T02D1351:274a-7: pa phyag rgya'o // kyis so // de la spangs
T02D1351:274a-8: pa chen po nyid ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i
T02D1351:274a-9: sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin
T02D1351:274a-10: zhes bya ba'i 'od gsal ba mngon du byed pa'i
T02D1351:274a-11: pa phyag rgya'o // kyis so // mtshan nyid do
T02D1351:274a-12: // rtogs pa chen po nyid ni yongs su dag
T02D1351:274a-13: pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid zung du
T02D1351:274a-14: 'jug pa zhes bya ba cho sku mngon du byed
T02D1351:274a-16: gang zhig yid mun pa nyams pa la sogs pa
T02D1351:274a-17: dri ma ma lus pa dang bral ba nam mkha'
T02D1351:274a-18: lta bu stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa 'od
T02D1351:274a-19: gsal ba mngon sum du byed pa kho na sangs
T02D1351:274a-20: rgyas kyi chos mtha' dag rtogs pas te ;
T02D1351:274a-21: ma lus pa'i rgyu ni sna tshogs pa'i don phun
T02D1351:274a-22: sum tshogs pa'i nus pa'i ngo bos de la sangs
T02D1351:274a-23: rgyas kyi chos thams cad yod pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1351:274a-24: ro // de nyid kyi phyir chos rnams kyi rten gyi sku ni chos kyi sku'o zhes brjod do //
T02D1351:274a-25: de la yang rab tu snang ba ma yin na
T02D1351:274a-26: yang rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa yin na bum
T02D1351:274a-27: pa rab tu snang ba na snam bu la sogs
T02D1351:274a-28: pa rtogs par thal ba bzlog par dka' ste /
T02D1351:274a-29: gang yang grangs can pa'i lta ba sun ma phyung ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
T02D1351:274a-30: gzhan yang sgyu ma rang rmi lam dang dri bra'i
T02D1351:274a-31: grong khyer dang bral bab la sogs pa bzhin du

T02D1351:281a-28: phyi nas zangs byung ba de'i tshe dri ma de

T02D1351:281a-35: de'i phyir 'di rang dben pa'i don yin te dri

T02D1351:281b-19: dri ma med par gnas pa ltar //
T02D1351:281b-20: nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang //

T02D1351:281b-32: su bcad pas srog bcad pa grol ba'i slar yang

T02D1351:281b-35: ces pa la sogs pa la /

T02D1351:283a-0: nyams pa ste de'i phyir khu ba @283a * //

T02D1351:283a-21: byed yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma ste yang

T02D1351:283a-23: li k'a li dag gam g-yon pa dang g-yas pa

T02D1351:283a-36: 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod pa'i gtso la spyi bos 'dud //

T02D1351:283a-39: 'khor lo'i gang gis bgrod par bya ba dang rtogs
T02D1351:283a-40: par bya ba de zhabs te mi 'gyur ba'i ye

T02D1351:283b-31: phyir sngags kyang mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes

T02D1351:287a-38: brjod pa de yang don dam pa ma yin no
T02D1351:287a-40: shes rab ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:287a-41: shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min na tha dad
T02D1351:287a-42: du gyur pa'i phung po yod na gang gis de
T02D1351:287a-43: dbyer med pa byang chub kyi sems su 'gyur te
T02D1351:287a-44: gnas skabs de gyis pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis
T02D1351:287b-0: rnam par @287b shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i
T02D1351:287b-1: phyir ro // lhan cig skyes pa zhes pa yang
T02D1351:287b-2: shes rab blo dang lhan cig skyes pa nyid kyi
T02D1351:287b-3: phyir ro // phyir brjod do // kun nas bde
T02D1351:287b-4: ba rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs thob pa la sgrib pa
T02D1351:287b-5: thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs
T02D1351:287b-6: pa dang shes bya la sogs pa sgrib pa thams
T02D1351:287b-8: gos med ni lag pa la sogs pas reg tu med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:287b-9: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir lus dang dbang po spangs pa'o //
T02D1351:287b-10: thams cad la yongs su khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir kun nas so //
T02D1351:287b-11: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir 'byung po kun la gnas pa ste /
T02D1351:287b-13: rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa nyid
T02D1351:287b-14: kyi phyir ma rig pa mi shes pa'i gri gug
T02D1351:287b-16: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las 'das pa'i phyir
T02D1351:287b-17: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dbyer med pa nyid las
T02D1351:287b-19: rang 'byung zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs su bcad
T02D1351:287b-20: pa gsum 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems dpa' drug
T02D1351:287b-21: mdor bstan pa'o // ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i phyir rang 'byung ngo //
T02D1351:287b-22: 'gro ba'i don byed pa nyid kyi phyir don chen no //
T02D1351:287b-23: gsang ba la sogs pa'i gtsug tor gyi mthar thug
T02D1351:287b-24: pa 'khor lo drug tu rim pas rdo rje sems
T02D1351:287b-25: dpa' dang sems dpa' chen po dang byang chub sems
T02D1351:287b-26: dpa' dang dam tshig sems dpa' dang rdo rje rnal
T02D1351:287b-27: 'byor dang dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba drug
T02D1351:287b-28: go // 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'i rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1351:287b-29: rdo rje stong pa'i gzugs te gang gi phyir de mi phyed pa de'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:287b-30: don chen ni chen po mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1351:287b-31: sems dpa' ni gang 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'i
T02D1351:287b-32: ngo bo lus dang ngag dang sems rnams gcig pa
T02D1351:287b-34: de ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i mdor bstan pa'o zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1351:287b-35: yang na rdo rje ni gang mi phyed pa sku
T02D1351:287b-36: dang gsung dang thugs ro gcig pa ste bde ba
T02D1351:287b-38: sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid //
T02D1351:287b-40: 'di dag gcig pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba
T02D1351:287b-41: ste chen po ni bde ba chen po rdzogs pa
T02D1351:288a-2: de yang sems dpa' sa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:288a-3: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ni mdor bstan pa'o zhes pa sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D1351:288a-4: yang na gang zhig chen po sgras 'dir mchog tu
T02D1351:288a-5: mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba ste de dang sems dpa'
T02D1351:288a-6: sa rnams kyi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sems
T02D1351:288a-7: dpa' chen po'o // gang gi phyir 'di ni byang
T02D1351:288a-8: chub stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid chos
T02D1351:288a-9: kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa ni mi g-yo bar
T02D1351:288a-10: gnas pa ste nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i ngo
T02D1351:288a-11: bo zhe sdang gi tshogs rnams las rnam par rgyal
T02D1351:288a-12: dpa' chen po'o // ba'i phyir ro // zhe sdang
T02D1351:288a-13: chen po dgra che ba yang mdor bstan pa ste
T02D1351:288a-14: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1351:288a-15: dam tshig ni 'dus pa ste zla ba bdud rtsi'i
T02D1351:288a-16: khu ba'i bde ba 'pho ba med pa'i ngo bo
T02D1351:288a-17: zab ste gti mug las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyir
T02D1351:288a-18: ro // gti mug chen po gti mug blo can
T02D1351:288a-19: rnams kyi gti mug gti mug gsod par byed pa
T02D1351:288a-20: yang mdor bstan pa de'i phyir dam tshig sems dpa'o
T02D1351:288a-21: ro // // gang gi phyir de nyid sku la
T02D1351:288a-22: sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams kyi shes rab gzugs dang
T02D1351:288a-23: mi 'gyur ba'i thig le rnams dang bcas pa gcig
T02D1351:288a-24: tu sbyor ba las gcig pa nyid ni khro bo
T02D1351:288a-25: las nges par rgyal ba khro bo chen po ste
T02D1351:288a-26: bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1351:288a-27: khro bo'i bdud rnams kyi dgra yang mdor bstan pa'o zhes pa rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1351:288a-28: gang gi phyir rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bde ba chen
T02D1351:288a-29: po de ni dus te thabs de las mtha' yas
T02D1351:288a-30: pa'i sems can gyi don yongs su mi 'dor ba
T02D1351:288a-31: ni 'khor lo zhes bya ste bcom ldan 'das so
T02D1351:288a-33: sems can grol nas chags chen po //
T02D1351:288a-34: 'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed kyang mdor bstan pa'o zhes pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1351:288a-35: rtsa drug gi rang bzhin rtsibs drug pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1351:288a-36: la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'di rnams
T02D1351:288a-37: so sor rnam pa drug go //
T02D1351:288a-38: de la dung can ma'i rang bzhin 'og gi rtsibs la mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1351:288a-39: ra sa n'a'i rang bzhin lho'i rtsibs la mi 'gyur ba'i tshor ba'o //
T02D1351:288a-40: aa wa dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin steng gi rtsibs la mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1351:288b-0: bshang ba'i @288b rtsa'i rang bzhin nub kyi rtsibs la mi 'gyur ba'i gzugs so //
T02D1351:288b-1: gci ba'i rtsa'i rang bzhin shar gyi rtsibs la mi 'gyur ba'i 'du byed do //
T02D1351:288b-2: la la n'a'i rang bzhin byang gi rtsibs la mi
T02D1351:288b-3: 'gyur ba'i 'du shes so zhes pa phung po drug
T02D1351:288b-4: rnams so // rigs drug po de rnams nyid rim
T02D1351:288b-5: pa ji lta bar mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes la
T02D1351:288b-6: sogs pa khams drug rnams kyi'o //
T02D1351:288b-7: de bzhin du mi 'gyur ba'i yid la sogs pa'i dbang po drug po rnams dang /
T02D1351:288b-8: de bzhin du mi 'gyur ba'i sgra la sogs pa'i yul drug po rnams dang /
T02D1351:288b-9: dbang pos nye bar mtshon nas mi 'gyur ba'i mchog
T02D1351:288b-10: gi dbang po dang lag pa dang gci ba'i lam
T02D1351:288b-11: dang bshang lam dang ngag dang rkang pa zhes bya
T02D1351:288b-12: ba las kyi dbang po rnams dang /
T02D1351:288b-13: de bzhin du yul gyis nye bar mtshon nas mi
T02D1351:288b-14: 'gyur ba'i khu ba 'pho ba dang len pa dang
T02D1351:288b-15: gci ba 'dzag pa dang bshang ba 'dzag pa dang
T02D1351:288b-16: brjod pa dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba las kyi
T02D1351:288b-17: dbang po'i bya ba rnams kyi'o //
T02D1351:288b-18: sum cu rtsa drug po 'di rnams kyang rim pas
T02D1351:288b-19: dkyil 'khor la ste 'dod pa chen po zhes bya
T02D1351:288b-20: ba rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dod chags chen po
T02D1351:288b-21: zhes bya ba rin chen dbang po dang khro bo
T02D1351:288b-22: chen po zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1351:288b-23: gti mug chen po zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1351:288b-24: zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba don yod grub pa dang /
T02D1351:288b-25: chags pa chen po zhes bya ba 'od dpag med dang /
T02D1351:288b-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gos dkar mo rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma /
T02D1351:288b-33: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba /
T02D1351:288b-41: gzugs rdo rje ma rnams dang /
T02D1351:289a-0: lha sum cu rtsa drug la khyab par byed pa bsam du @289a * //
T02D1351:289a-1: med pa'i thugs rdo rje 'di yang sgrib pa dang
T02D1351:289a-2: bcas pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa 'gog pa'i phyir
T02D1351:289a-4: 'dod pa chen po la sogs pa gdong drug po
T02D1351:289a-5: 'chi bdag gi bdud la sogs pa rnams 'jigs par
T02D1351:289a-6: byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'jigs byed ces pa ste
T02D1351:289a-7: / brjod pa'i ye shes la sogs pa rigs drug rnams kyi tshul gyi yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1351:289a-8: lus zhes pa sku'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1351:289a-9: gsang ba dbang po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1351:289a-10: sems thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te gsum po 'di rnams
T02D1351:289a-11: kyi bdag nyid 'di ni rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1351:289a-12: ro // lam bsgoms pas grub pa dag pa de
T02D1351:289a-13: yang sngar brjod pa'i shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje
T02D1351:289a-14: gsum rnam par dag pa drug po rnams kyi rdo
T02D1351:289a-15: rje sems dpa' nyid bsam du med pa'i thugs rdo
T02D1351:289a-17: dbang mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba dbang bcu gcig
T02D1351:289a-18: gi sgrub thabs dang mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang
T02D1351:289a-19: gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyang rab tu gsal bar brjod
T02D1351:289a-20: pa dang rtsa dang rigs kyang rab tu gsal bar
T02D1351:289a-22: kye zla ba bzang po phyag na rdo rje /
T02D1351:289a-23: mdor bstan pas ni mdor bsdus te gsal bar bshad do zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D1351:289a-24: dag pa don dam gsal byed pa //
T02D1351:289a-25: sgrib dang mun pa thams cad 'joms //
T02D1351:289a-27: mdor bstan zla ba'i zla 'od do //
T02D1351:289a-28: zhes pa dbang mdor bstan pa'i 'grel bshad don dam
T02D1351:289a-29: pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po
T02D1351:289a-30: grub pa'i slob dpon dpal n'a ro'i zhabs kyis mdzad
T02D1351:289a-32: / kha che'i pandi ta dharm'a dha ra dang /
T02D1351:289a-33: lo ts'a ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal po'i mthil du bsgyur ba las /
T02D1351:289a-34: slar yang legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod
T02D1351:289a-35: ba'i tshul rigs pa rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis dpal
T02D1351:289a-36: sa skya'i chos grva chen por legs par bsgyur cing
T02D1351:289a-37: zhus te dag par byas pa'o /
